        <td id="L129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="129"></td>

        <td id="L194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="194"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="195"></td>
        <td id="LC195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">      Addenda                                                   109</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="196"></td>
        <td id="LC196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="197"></td>
        <td id="LC197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[vii]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="198"></td>
        <td id="LC198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="199"></td>
        <td id="LC199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="200"></td>
        <td id="LC200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="201"></td>
        <td id="LC201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="202"></td>
        <td id="LC202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">PREFACE.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="203"></td>
        <td id="LC203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="204"></td>
        <td id="LC204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="205"></td>
        <td id="LC205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The present work is a modest effort to reproduce approximately, in modern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="206"></td>
        <td id="LC206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">measures, the venerable epic, Beowulf. _Approximately_, I repeat; for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="207"></td>
        <td id="LC207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very close reproduction of Anglo-Saxon verse would, to a large extent, be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="208"></td>
        <td id="LC208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prose to a modern ear.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="209"></td>
        <td id="LC209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="210"></td>
        <td id="LC210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Heyne-Socin text and glossary have been closely followed. Occasionally</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="211"></td>
        <td id="LC211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a deviation has been made, but always for what seemed good and sufficient</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="212"></td>
        <td id="LC212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reason. The translator does not aim to be an editor. Once in a while,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="213"></td>
        <td id="LC213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, he has added a conjecture of his own to the emendations quoted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="214"></td>
        <td id="LC214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the criticisms of other students of the poem.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="215"></td>
        <td id="LC215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="216"></td>
        <td id="LC216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This work is addressed to two classes of readers. From both of these alike</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="217"></td>
        <td id="LC217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the translator begs sympathy and co-operation. The Anglo-Saxon scholar he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="218"></td>
        <td id="LC218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hopes to please by adhering faithfully to the original. The student of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="219"></td>
        <td id="LC219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">English literature he aims to interest by giving him, in modern garb, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="220"></td>
        <td id="LC220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most ancient epic of our race. This is a bold and venturesome undertaking;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="221"></td>
        <td id="LC221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and yet there must be some students of the Teutonic past willing to follow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="222"></td>
        <td id="LC222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even a daring guide, if they may read in modern phrases of the sorrows of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="223"></td>
        <td id="LC223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hrothgar, of the prowess of Beowulf, and of the feelings that stirred the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="224"></td>
        <td id="LC224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hearts of our forefathers in their primeval homes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="225"></td>
        <td id="LC225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="226"></td>
        <td id="LC226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In order to please the larger class of readers, a regular cadence has been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="227"></td>
        <td id="LC227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">used, a measure which, while retaining the essential characteristics of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="228"></td>
        <td id="LC228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the original, permits the reader to see ahead of him in reading.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="229"></td>
        <td id="LC229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="230"></td>
        <td id="LC230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Perhaps every Anglo-Saxon scholar has his own theory as to how Beowulf</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="231"></td>
        <td id="LC231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should be translated. Some have given us prose versions of what we believe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="232"></td>
        <td id="LC232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be a great poem. Is it any reflection on our honored Kemble and Arnold</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="233"></td>
        <td id="LC233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to say that their translations fail to show a layman that Beowulf is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="234"></td>
        <td id="LC234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justly called our first _epic_? Of those translators who have used verse,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="235"></td>
        <td id="LC235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several have written from what would seem a mistaken point of view. Is it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="236"></td>
        <td id="LC236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proper, for instance, that the grave and solemn speeches of Beowulf and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="237"></td>
        <td id="LC237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hrothgar be put in ballad measures, tripping lightly and airily along? Or,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="238"></td>
        <td id="LC238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again, is it fitting that the rough martial music of Anglo-Saxon verse be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="239"></td>
        <td id="LC239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interpreted to us in the smooth measures of modern blank verse? Do we hear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="240"></td>
        <td id="LC240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what has been beautifully called "the clanging tread of a warrior in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="241"></td>
        <td id="LC241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mail"?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="242"></td>
        <td id="LC242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="243"></td>
        <td id="LC243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[viii]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="244"></td>
        <td id="LC244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="245"></td>
        <td id="LC245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of all English translations of Beowulf, that of Professor Garnett alone</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="246"></td>
        <td id="LC246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gives any adequate idea of the chief characteristics of this great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="247"></td>
        <td id="LC247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Teutonic epic.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="248"></td>
        <td id="LC248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="249"></td>
        <td id="LC249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The measure used in the present translation is believed to be as near a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="250"></td>
        <td id="LC250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reproduction of the original as modern English affords. The cadences</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="251"></td>
        <td id="LC251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">closely resemble those used by Browning in some of his most striking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="252"></td>
        <td id="LC252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poems. The four stresses of the Anglo-Saxon verse are retained, and as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="253"></td>
        <td id="LC253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much thesis and anacrusis is allowed as is consistent with a regular</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="254"></td>
        <td id="LC254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cadence. Alliteration has been used to a large extent; but it was thought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="255"></td>
        <td id="LC255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that modern ears would hardly tolerate it on every line. End-rhyme has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="256"></td>
        <td id="LC256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been used occasionally; internal rhyme, sporadically. Both have some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="257"></td>
        <td id="LC257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warrant in Anglo-Saxon poetry. (For end-rhyme, see 1_53, 1_54; for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="258"></td>
        <td id="LC258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">internal rhyme, 2_21, 6_40.)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="259"></td>
        <td id="LC259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="260"></td>
        <td id="LC260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What Gummere[1] calls the "rime-giver" has been studiously kept; _viz._,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="261"></td>
        <td id="LC261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the first accented syllable in the second half-verse always carries the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="262"></td>
        <td id="LC262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alliteration; and the last accented syllable alliterates only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="263"></td>
        <td id="LC263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sporadically. Alternate alliteration is occasionally used as in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="264"></td>
        <td id="LC264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">original. (See 7_61, 8_5.)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="265"></td>
        <td id="LC265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="266"></td>
        <td id="LC266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No two accented syllables have been brought together, except occasionally</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="267"></td>
        <td id="LC267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after a cÃ¦sural pause. (See 2_19 and 12_1.) Or, scientifically speaking,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="268"></td>
        <td id="LC268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sievers's C type has been avoided as not consonant with the plan of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="269"></td>
        <td id="LC269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">translation. Several of his types, however, constantly occur; _e.g._ A and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="270"></td>
        <td id="LC270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a variant (/ x | / x) (/ x x | / x); B and a variant (x / | x / ) (x x / |</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="271"></td>
        <td id="LC271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">x / ); a variant of D (/ x | / x x); E (/ x x | / ). Anacrusis gives</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="272"></td>
        <td id="LC272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">further variety to the types used in the translation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="273"></td>
        <td id="LC273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="274"></td>
        <td id="LC274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The parallelisms of the original have been faithfully preserved. (_E.g._,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="275"></td>
        <td id="LC275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">1_16 and 1_17: "Lord" and "Wielder of Glory"; 1_30, 1_31, 1_32; 2_12 and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="276"></td>
        <td id="LC276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">2_13; 2_27 and 2_28; 3_5 and 3_6.) Occasionally, some loss has been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="277"></td>
        <td id="LC277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sustained; but, on the other hand, a gain has here and there been made.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="278"></td>
        <td id="LC278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="279"></td>
        <td id="LC279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The effort has been made to give a decided flavor of archaism to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="280"></td>
        <td id="LC280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">translation. All words not in keeping with the spirit of the poem have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="281"></td>
        <td id="LC281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been avoided. Again, though many archaic words have been used, there are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="282"></td>
        <td id="LC282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">none, it is believed, which are not found in standard modern poetry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="283"></td>
        <td id="LC283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="284"></td>
        <td id="LC284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[ix]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="285"></td>
        <td id="LC285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="286"></td>
        <td id="LC286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With these preliminary remarks, it will not be amiss to give an outline of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="287"></td>
        <td id="LC287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the story of the poem.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="288"></td>
        <td id="LC288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="289"></td>
        <td id="LC289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="290"></td>
        <td id="LC290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_THE STORY._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="291"></td>
        <td id="LC291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="292"></td>
        <td id="LC292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Hrothgar, king of the Danes, or Scyldings, builds a great mead-hall, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="293"></td>
        <td id="LC293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">palace, in which he hopes to feast his liegemen and to give them presents.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="294"></td>
        <td id="LC294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The joy of king and retainers is, however, of short duration. Grendel, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="295"></td>
        <td id="LC295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">monster, is seized with hateful jealousy. He cannot brook the sounds of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="296"></td>
        <td id="LC296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">joyance that reach him down in his fen-dwelling near the hall. Oft and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="297"></td>
        <td id="LC297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anon he goes to the joyous building, bent on direful mischief. Thane after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="298"></td>
        <td id="LC298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thane is ruthlessly carried off and devoured, while no one is found strong</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="299"></td>
        <td id="LC299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough and bold enough to cope with the monster. For twelve years he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="300"></td>
        <td id="LC300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persecutes Hrothgar and his vassals._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="301"></td>
        <td id="LC301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="302"></td>
        <td id="LC302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Over sea, a day's voyage off, Beowulf, of the Geats, nephew of Higelac,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="303"></td>
        <td id="LC303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">king of the Geats, hears of Grendel's doings and of Hrothgar's misery. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="304"></td>
        <td id="LC304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolves to crush the fell monster and relieve the aged king. With</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="305"></td>
        <td id="LC305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fourteen chosen companions, he sets sail for Dane-land. Reaching that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="306"></td>
        <td id="LC306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country, he soon persuades Hrothgar of his ability to help him. The hours</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="307"></td>
        <td id="LC307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that elapse before night are spent in beer-drinking and conversation. When</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="308"></td>
        <td id="LC308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hrothgar's bedtime comes he leaves the hall in charge of Beowulf, telling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="309"></td>
        <td id="LC309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him that never before has he given to another the absolute wardship of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="310"></td>
        <td id="LC310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">palace. All retire to rest, Beowulf, as it were, sleeping upon his arms._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="311"></td>
        <td id="LC311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="312"></td>
        <td id="LC312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Grendel comes, the great march-stepper, bearing God's anger. He seizes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="313"></td>
        <td id="LC313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and kills one of the sleeping warriors. Then he advances towards Beowulf.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="314"></td>
        <td id="LC314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A fierce and desperate hand-to-hand struggle ensues. No arms are used,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="315"></td>
        <td id="LC315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both combatants trusting to strength and hand-grip. Beowulf tears</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="316"></td>
        <td id="LC316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Grendel's shoulder from its socket, and the monster retreats to his den,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="317"></td>
        <td id="LC317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">howling and yelling with agony and fury. The wound is fatal._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="318"></td>
        <td id="LC318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="319"></td>
        <td id="LC319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_The next morning, at early dawn, warriors in numbers flock to the hall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="320"></td>
        <td id="LC320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Heorot, to hear the news. Joy is boundless. Glee runs high. Hrothgar and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="321"></td>
        <td id="LC321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his retainers are lavish of gratitude and of gifts._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="322"></td>
        <td id="LC322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="323"></td>
        <td id="LC323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Grendel's mother, however, comes the next night to avenge his death. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="324"></td>
        <td id="LC324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is furious and raging. While Beowulf is sleeping in a room somewhat apart</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="325"></td>
        <td id="LC325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[x] from the quarters of the other warriors, she seizes one of Hrothgar's</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="326"></td>
        <td id="LC326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">favorite counsellors, and carries him off and devours him. Beowulf is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="327"></td>
        <td id="LC327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">called. Determined to leave Heorot entirely purified, he arms himself, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="328"></td>
        <td id="LC328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">goes down to look for the female monster. After traveling through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="329"></td>
        <td id="LC329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waters many hours, he meets her near the sea-bottom. She drags him to her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="330"></td>
        <td id="LC330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">den. There he sees Grendel lying dead. After a desperate and almost fatal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="331"></td>
        <td id="LC331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struggle with the woman, he slays her, and swims upward in triumph, taking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="332"></td>
        <td id="LC332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with him Grendel's head._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="333"></td>
        <td id="LC333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="334"></td>
        <td id="LC334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Joy is renewed at Heorot. Congratulations crowd upon the victor. Hrothgar</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="335"></td>
        <td id="LC335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">literally pours treasures into the lap of Beowulf; and it is agreed among</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="336"></td>
        <td id="LC336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the vassals of the king that Beowulf will be their next liegelord._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="337"></td>
        <td id="LC337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="338"></td>
        <td id="LC338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Beowulf leaves Dane-land. Hrothgar weeps and laments at his departure._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="339"></td>
        <td id="LC339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="340"></td>
        <td id="LC340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_When the hero arrives in his own land, Higelac treats him as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="341"></td>
        <td id="LC341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distinguished guest. He is the hero of the hour._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="342"></td>
        <td id="LC342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="343"></td>
        <td id="LC343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Beowulf subsequently becomes king of his own people, the Geats. After he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="344"></td>
        <td id="LC344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has been ruling for fifty years, his own neighborhood is wofully harried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="345"></td>
        <td id="LC345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by a fire-spewing dragon. Beowulf determines to kill him. In the ensuing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="346"></td>
        <td id="LC346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struggle both Beowulf and the dragon are slain. The grief of the Geats is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="347"></td>
        <td id="LC347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inexpressible. They determine, however, to leave nothing undone to honor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="348"></td>
        <td id="LC348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the memory of their lord. A great funeral-pyre is built, and his body is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="349"></td>
        <td id="LC349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">burnt. Then a memorial-barrow is made, visible from a great distance, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="350"></td>
        <td id="LC350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sailors afar may be constantly reminded of the prowess of the national</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="351"></td>
        <td id="LC351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hero of Geatland._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="352"></td>
        <td id="LC352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="353"></td>
        <td id="LC353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_The poem closes with a glowing tribute to his bravery, his gentleness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="354"></td>
        <td id="LC354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his goodness of heart, and his generosity._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="355"></td>
        <td id="LC355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="356"></td>
        <td id="LC356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="357"></td>
        <td id="LC357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="358"></td>
        <td id="LC358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is the devout desire of this translator to hasten the day when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="359"></td>
        <td id="LC359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">story of Beowulf shall be as familiar to English-speaking peoples as that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="360"></td>
        <td id="LC360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Iliad. Beowulf is our first great epic. It is an epitomized history</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="361"></td>
        <td id="LC361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the life of the Teutonic races. It brings vividly before us our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="362"></td>
        <td id="LC362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forefathers of pre-Alfredian eras, in their love of war, of sea, and of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="363"></td>
        <td id="LC363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">adventure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="364"></td>
        <td id="LC364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="365"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="478"></td>
        <td id="LC478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">~Beowulf~.--The hero of the poem. Sprung from the stock of Geats, son of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="479"></td>
        <td id="LC479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ecgtheow. Brought up by his maternal grandfather Hrethel, and figuring in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="480"></td>
        <td id="LC480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manhood as a devoted liegeman of his uncle Higelac. A hero from his youth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="481"></td>
        <td id="LC481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Has the strength of thirty men. Engages in a swimming-match with Breca.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="482"></td>
        <td id="LC482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Goes to the help of Hrothgar against the monster Grendel. Vanquishes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="483"></td>
        <td id="LC483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Grendel and his mother. Afterwards becomes king of the Geats. Late in life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="484"></td>
        <td id="LC484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attempts to kill a fire-spewing dragon, and is slain. Is buried with great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="485"></td>
        <td id="LC485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honors. His memorial mound.--6_26; 7_2; 7_9; 9_3; 9_8; 12_28; 12_43; 23_1,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="486"></td>
        <td id="LC486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">etc.</td>

        <td id="L518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="518"></td>

        <td id="L522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="522"></td>
        <td id="LC522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">~Eanmund~.--Son of Ohthere and brother of Eadgils. The reference to these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="523"></td>
        <td id="LC523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brothers is vague, and variously understood. Heyne supposes as follows:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="524"></td>
        <td id="LC524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Raising a revolt against their father, they are obliged to leave Sweden.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="525"></td>
        <td id="LC525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They go to the land of the Geats; with what intention, is not known, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="526"></td>
        <td id="LC526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">probably to conquer and plunder. The Geatish king, Heardred, is slain by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="527"></td>
        <td id="LC527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one of the brothers, probably Eanmund.--36_10; 31_54 to 31_60; 33_66 to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="572"></td>
        <td id="LC572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Is furiously envious when he hears sounds of joy in Hrothgar's palace.</td>

        <td id="LC908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">WEB.--Tapestry (that which is 'woven').</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L1005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1005"></td>
        <td id="LC1005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 That a folk ever furnished a float more superbly</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1006"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1100"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1101"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1197"></td>
        <td id="LC1197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 Too loathsome and lasting. Not longer he tarried,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1198"></td>
        <td id="LC1198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But one night after continued his slaughter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1199"></td>
        <td id="LC1199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Shameless and shocking, shrinking but little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1200"></td>
        <td id="LC1200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          From malice and murder; they mastered him fully.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1201"></td>
        <td id="LC1201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He was easy to find then who otherwhere looked for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1202"></td>
        <td id="LC1202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 A pleasanter place of repose in the lodges,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1203"></td>
        <td id="LC1203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A bed in the bowers. Then was brought to his notice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1204"></td>
        <td id="LC1204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Told him truly by token apparent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1205"></td>
        <td id="LC1205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The hall-thane's hatred: he held himself after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1206"></td>
        <td id="LC1206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Further and faster who the foeman did baffle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1207"></td>
        <td id="LC1207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 [2]So ruled he and strongly strove against justice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1208"></td>
        <td id="LC1208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Lone against all men, till empty uptowered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1209"></td>
        <td id="LC1209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1210"></td>
        <td id="LC1210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{King Hrothgar's agony and suspense last twelve years.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1211"></td>
        <td id="LC1211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1212"></td>
        <td id="LC1212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The choicest of houses. Long was the season:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1213"></td>
        <td id="LC1213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Twelve-winters' time torture suffered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1214"></td>
        <td id="LC1214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The friend of the Scyldings, every affliction,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1215"></td>
        <td id="LC1215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 Endless agony; hence it after[3] became</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1216"></td>
        <td id="LC1216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Certainly known to the children of men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1217"></td>
        <td id="LC1217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Sadly in measures, that long against Hrothgar</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1218"></td>
        <td id="LC1218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Grendel struggled:--his grudges he cherished,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1219"></td>
        <td id="LC1219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Murderous malice, many a winter,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1220"></td>
        <td id="LC1220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 Strife unremitting, and peacefully wished he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1221"></td>
        <td id="LC1221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          [4]Life-woe to lift from no liegeman at all of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1222"></td>
        <td id="LC1222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The men of the Dane-folk, for money to settle,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1223"></td>
        <td id="LC1223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          No counsellor needed count for a moment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1224"></td>
        <td id="LC1224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[7]       On handsome amends at the hands of the murderer;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1225"></td>
        <td id="LC1225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1226"></td>
        <td id="LC1226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Grendel is unremitting in his persecutions.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1227"></td>
        <td id="LC1227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1228"></td>
        <td id="LC1228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 The monster of evil fiercely did harass,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1229"></td>
        <td id="LC1229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The ill-planning death-shade, both elder and younger,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1230"></td>
        <td id="LC1230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Trapping and tricking them. He trod every night then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1231"></td>
        <td id="LC1231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The mist-covered moor-fens; men do not know where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1232"></td>
        <td id="LC1232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Witches and wizards wander and ramble.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1233"></td>
        <td id="LC1233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 So the foe of mankind many of evils</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1234"></td>
        <td id="LC1234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Grievous injuries, often accomplished,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1235"></td>
        <td id="LC1235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Horrible hermit; Heort he frequented,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1236"></td>
        <td id="LC1236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gem-bedecked palace, when night-shades had fallen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1237"></td>
        <td id="LC1237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1238"></td>
        <td id="LC1238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{God is against the monster.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1239"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1240"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1241"></td>
        <td id="LC1241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 The light-flashing jewel, love of Him knew not).</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1242"></td>
        <td id="LC1242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Twas a fearful affliction to the friend of the Scyldings</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1243"></td>
        <td id="LC1243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1244"></td>
        <td id="LC1244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The king and his council deliberate in vain.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1245"></td>
        <td id="LC1245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1246"></td>
        <td id="LC1246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Soul-crushing sorrow. Not seldom in private</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1247"></td>
        <td id="LC1247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Sat the king in his council; conference held they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1248"></td>
        <td id="LC1248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          What the braves should determine 'gainst terrors unlooked for.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1249"></td>
        <td id="LC1249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1250"></td>
        <td id="LC1250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{They invoke the aid of their gods.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1251"></td>
        <td id="LC1251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1252"></td>
        <td id="LC1252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       60 At the shrines of their idols often they promised</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1253"></td>
        <td id="LC1253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gifts and offerings, earnestly prayed they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1254"></td>
        <td id="LC1254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The devil from hell would help them to lighten</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1255"></td>
        <td id="LC1255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Their people's oppression. Such practice they used then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1256"></td>
        <td id="LC1256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hope of the heathen; hell they remembered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1257"></td>
        <td id="LC1257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       65 In innermost spirit, God they knew not,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1258"></td>
        <td id="LC1258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1259"></td>
        <td id="LC1259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The true God they do not know.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1260"></td>
        <td id="LC1260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1261"></td>
        <td id="LC1261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Judge of their actions, All-wielding Ruler,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1262"></td>
        <td id="LC1262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          No praise could they give the Guardian of Heaven,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1263"></td>
        <td id="LC1263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The Wielder of Glory. Woe will be his who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1264"></td>
        <td id="LC1264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Through furious hatred his spirit shall drive to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1265"></td>
        <td id="LC1265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       70 The clutch of the fire, no comfort shall look for,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1266"></td>
        <td id="LC1266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Wax no wiser; well for the man who,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1267"></td>
        <td id="LC1267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Living his life-days, his Lord may face</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1268"></td>
        <td id="LC1268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And find defence in his Father's embrace!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1269"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1290"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1291"></td>
        <td id="LC1291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    [5] Of this difficult passage the following interpretations among</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1292"></td>
        <td id="LC1292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    others are given: (1) Though Grendel has frequented Heorot as a demon,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1293"></td>
        <td id="LC1293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    he could not become ruler of the Danes, on account of his hostility to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1294"></td>
        <td id="LC1294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    God. (2) Hrothgar was much grieved that Grendel had not appeared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1295"></td>
        <td id="LC1295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    before his throne to receive presents. (3) He was not permitted to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1296"></td>
        <td id="LC1296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    devastate the hall, on account of the Creator; _i.e._ God wished to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1297"></td>
        <td id="LC1297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    make his visit fatal to him.--Ne ... wisse (169) W. renders: _Nor had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1298"></td>
        <td id="LC1298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    he any desire to do so_; 'his' being obj. gen. = danach.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1299"></td>
        <td id="LC1299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L1307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1307"></td>
        <td id="LC1307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">BEOWULF GOES TO HROTHGAR'S ASSISTANCE.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1308"></td>
        <td id="LC1308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1309"></td>
        <td id="LC1309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1310"></td>
        <td id="LC1310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Hrothgar sees no way of escape from the persecutions of Grendel.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1311"></td>
        <td id="LC1311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1312"></td>
        <td id="LC1312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          So Healfdene's kinsman constantly mused on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1313"></td>
        <td id="LC1313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His long-lasting sorrow; the battle-thane clever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1314"></td>
        <td id="LC1314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Was not anywise able evils to 'scape from:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1315"></td>
        <td id="LC1315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Too crushing the sorrow that came to the people,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1316"></td>
        <td id="LC1316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 Loathsome and lasting the life-grinding torture,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1317"></td>
        <td id="LC1317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1318"></td>
        <td id="LC1318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf, the Geat, hero of the poem, hears of Hrothgar's sorrow, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1319"></td>
        <td id="LC1319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolves to go to his assistance.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1320"></td>
        <td id="LC1320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1321"></td>
        <td id="LC1321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Greatest of night-woes. So Higelac's liegeman,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1322"></td>
        <td id="LC1322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Good amid Geatmen, of Grendel's achievements</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1323"></td>
        <td id="LC1323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Heard in his home:[1] of heroes then living</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1324"></td>
        <td id="LC1324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He was stoutest and strongest, sturdy and noble.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1325"></td>
        <td id="LC1325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       10 He bade them prepare him a bark that was trusty;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1326"></td>
        <td id="LC1326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He said he the war-king would seek o'er the ocean,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1327"></td>
        <td id="LC1327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The folk-leader noble, since he needed retainers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1328"></td>
        <td id="LC1328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          For the perilous project prudent companions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1329"></td>
        <td id="LC1329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Chided him little, though loving him dearly;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1330"></td>
        <td id="LC1330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 They egged the brave atheling, augured him glory.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1331"></td>
        <td id="LC1331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1333"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L1334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1334"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1335"></td>
        <td id="LC1335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Had liegemen selected, likest to prove them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1336"></td>
        <td id="LC1336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Trustworthy warriors; with fourteen companions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1337"></td>
        <td id="LC1337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The vessel he looked for; a liegeman then showed them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1338"></td>
        <td id="LC1338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 A sea-crafty man, the bounds of the country.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1339"></td>
        <td id="LC1339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fast the days fleeted; the float was a-water,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1340"></td>
        <td id="LC1340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The craft by the cliff. Clomb to the prow then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1341"></td>
        <td id="LC1341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Well-equipped warriors: the wave-currents twisted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1342"></td>
        <td id="LC1342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The sea on the sand; soldiers then carried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1343"></td>
        <td id="LC1343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 On the breast of the vessel bright-shining jewels,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1344"></td>
        <td id="LC1344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Handsome war-armor; heroes outshoved then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1345"></td>
        <td id="LC1345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Warmen the wood-ship, on its wished-for adventure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1346"></td>
        <td id="LC1346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1357"></td>
        <td id="LC1357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The twist-stemmed vessel had traveled such distance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1358"></td>
        <td id="LC1358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That the sailing-men saw the sloping embankments,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1359"></td>
        <td id="LC1359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The sea cliffs gleaming, precipitous mountains,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1360"></td>
        <td id="LC1360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Nesses enormous: they were nearing the limits</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1361"></td>
        <td id="LC1361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 At the end of the ocean.[2] Up thence quickly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1362"></td>
        <td id="LC1362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The men of the Weders clomb to the mainland,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1363"></td>
        <td id="LC1363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fastened their vessel (battle weeds rattled,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1364"></td>
        <td id="LC1364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          War burnies clattered), the Wielder they thanked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1365"></td>
        <td id="LC1365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That the ways o'er the waters had waxen so gentle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1366"></td>
        <td id="LC1366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1367"></td>
        <td id="LC1367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{They are hailed by the Danish coast guard}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1368"></td>
        <td id="LC1368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1369"></td>
        <td id="LC1369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 Then well from the cliff edge the guard of the Scyldings</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1370"></td>
        <td id="LC1370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who the sea-cliffs should see to, saw o'er the gangway</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1371"></td>
        <td id="LC1371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Brave ones bearing beauteous targets,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1372"></td>
        <td id="LC1372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Armor all ready, anxiously thought he,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1373"></td>
        <td id="LC1373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Musing and wondering what men were approaching.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1374"></td>
        <td id="LC1374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 High on his horse then Hrothgar's retainer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1375"></td>
        <td id="LC1375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Turned him to coastward, mightily brandished</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1376"></td>
        <td id="LC1376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His lance in his hands, questioned with boldness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1377"></td>
        <td id="LC1377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1378"></td>
        <td id="LC1378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{His challenge}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1379"></td>
        <td id="LC1379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1380"></td>
        <td id="LC1380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          "Who are ye men here, mail-covered warriors</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1381"></td>
        <td id="LC1381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Clad in your corslets, come thus a-driving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1382"></td>
        <td id="LC1382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 A high riding ship o'er the shoals of the waters,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1383"></td>
        <td id="LC1383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          [3]And hither 'neath helmets have hied o'er the ocean?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1384"></td>
        <td id="LC1384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[10]      I have been strand-guard, standing as warden,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1385"></td>
        <td id="LC1385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Lest enemies ever anywise ravage</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1386"></td>
        <td id="LC1386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Danish dominions with army of war-ships.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1387"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[11]      Folk-troop's defender: be free in thy counsels!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1466"></td>
        <td id="LC1466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To the noble one bear we a weighty commission,</td>

      <tr>
