        <td id="LC1467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The helm of the Danemen; we shall hide, I ween,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1468"></td>
        <td id="LC1468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1469"></td>
        <td id="LC1469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Is it true that a monster is slaying Danish heroes?}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1470"></td>
        <td id="LC1470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1471"></td>
        <td id="LC1471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 Naught of our message. Thou know'st if it happen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1472"></td>
        <td id="LC1472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          As we soothly heard say, that some savage despoiler,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1473"></td>
        <td id="LC1473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Some hidden pursuer, on nights that are murky</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1474"></td>
        <td id="LC1474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          By deeds very direful 'mid the Danemen exhibits</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1475"></td>
        <td id="LC1475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hatred unheard of, horrid destruction</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1476"></td>
        <td id="LC1476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 And the falling of dead. From feelings least selfish</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1477"></td>
        <td id="LC1477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1478"></td>
        <td id="LC1478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{I can help your king to free himself from this horrible creature.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1479"></td>
        <td id="LC1479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1480"></td>
        <td id="LC1480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I am able to render counsel to Hrothgar,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1481"></td>
        <td id="LC1481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          How he, wise and worthy, may worst the destroyer,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1482"></td>
        <td id="LC1482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          If the anguish of sorrow should ever be lessened,[1]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1483"></td>
        <td id="LC1483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Comfort come to him, and care-waves grow cooler,</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1575"></td>
        <td id="LC1575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With edges of iron: the armor-clad troopers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1576"></td>
        <td id="LC1576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1577"></td>
        <td id="LC1577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{A Danish hero asks them whence and why they are come.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1578"></td>
        <td id="LC1578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1579"></td>
        <td id="LC1579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Were decked with weapons. Then a proud-mooded hero</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1580"></td>
        <td id="LC1580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Asked of the champions questions of lineage:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1581"></td>
        <td id="LC1581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 "From what borders bear ye your battle-shields plated,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1582"></td>
        <td id="LC1582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gilded and gleaming, your gray-colored burnies,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1583"></td>
        <td id="LC1583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Helmets with visors and heap of war-lances?--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1584"></td>
        <td id="LC1584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To Hrothgar the king I am servant and liegeman.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1585"></td>
        <td id="LC1585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Mong folk from far-lands found I have never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1586"></td>
        <td id="LC1586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1587"></td>
        <td id="LC1587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{He expresses no little admiration for the strangers.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1588"></td>
        <td id="LC1588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1589"></td>
        <td id="LC1589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 Men so many of mien more courageous.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1590"></td>
        <td id="LC1590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I ween that from valor, nowise as outlaws,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1591"></td>
        <td id="LC1591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But from greatness of soul ye sought for King Hrothgar."</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1592"></td>
        <td id="LC1592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1593"></td>
        <td id="LC1593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf replies.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1594"></td>
        <td id="LC1594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1595"></td>
        <td id="LC1595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then the strength-famous earlman answer rendered,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1596"></td>
        <td id="LC1596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The proud-mooded Wederchief replied to his question,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1597"></td>
        <td id="LC1597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1598"></td>
        <td id="LC1598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{We are Higelac's table-companions, and bear an important commission to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1599"></td>
        <td id="LC1599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your prince.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1600"></td>
        <td id="LC1600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1601"></td>
        <td id="LC1601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 Hardy 'neath helmet: "Higelac's mates are we;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1602"></td>
        <td id="LC1602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Beowulf hight I. To the bairn of Healfdene,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1603"></td>
        <td id="LC1603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The famous folk-leader, I freely will tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1604"></td>
        <td id="LC1604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To thy prince my commission, if pleasantly hearing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1605"></td>
        <td id="LC1605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He'll grant we may greet him so gracious to all men."</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1606"></td>
        <td id="LC1606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 Wulfgar replied then (he was prince of the Wendels,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1607"></td>
        <td id="LC1607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His boldness of spirit was known unto many,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1608"></td>
        <td id="LC1608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His prowess and prudence): "The prince of the Scyldings,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1609"></td>
        <td id="LC1609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1610"></td>
        <td id="LC1610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Wulfgar, the thane, says that he will go and ask Hrothgar whether he will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1611"></td>
        <td id="LC1611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see the strangers.}</td>

        <td id="L1612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1612"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1613"></td>
        <td id="LC1613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The friend-lord of Danemen, I will ask of thy journey,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1614"></td>
        <td id="LC1614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The giver of rings, as thou urgest me do it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1615"></td>
        <td id="LC1615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 The folk-chief famous, and inform thee early</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1616"></td>
        <td id="LC1616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          What answer the good one mindeth to render me."</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1617"></td>
        <td id="LC1617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He turned then hurriedly where Hrothgar was sitting,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1618"></td>
        <td id="LC1618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          [2]Old and hoary, his earlmen attending him;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1619"></td>
        <td id="LC1619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The strength-famous went till he stood at the shoulder</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1620"></td>
        <td id="LC1620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 Of the lord of the Danemen, of courteous thanemen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1621"></td>
        <td id="LC1621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The custom he minded. Wulfgar addressed then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1622"></td>
        <td id="LC1622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His friendly liegelord: "Folk of the Geatmen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1623"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1631"></td>
        <td id="LC1631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          They make this petition: with thee, O my chieftain,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1632"></td>
        <td id="LC1632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To be granted a conference; O gracious King Hrothgar,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1633"></td>
        <td id="LC1633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Friendly answer refuse not to give them!</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1636"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L1637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1637"></td>
        <td id="LC1637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In war-trappings weeded worthy they seem</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1638"></td>
        <td id="LC1638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 Of earls to be honored; sure the atheling is doughty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1639"></td>
        <td id="LC1639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who headed the heroes hitherward coming."</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC1654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">HROTHGAR AND BEOWULF.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1655"></td>
        <td id="LC1655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1657"></td>
        <td id="LC1657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Hrothgar remembers Beowulf as a youth, and also remembers his father.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1658"></td>
        <td id="LC1658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1659"></td>
        <td id="LC1659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hrothgar answered, helm of the Scyldings:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1660"></td>
        <td id="LC1660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          "I remember this man as the merest of striplings.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1661"></td>
        <td id="LC1661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His father long dead now was Ecgtheow titled,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1662"></td>
        <td id="LC1662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Him Hrethel the Geatman granted at home his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1663"></td>
        <td id="LC1663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 One only daughter; his battle-brave son</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1664"></td>
        <td id="LC1664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Is come but now, sought a trustworthy friend.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1665"></td>
        <td id="LC1665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Seafaring sailors asserted it then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1666"></td>
        <td id="LC1666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1667"></td>
        <td id="LC1667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf is reported to have the strength of thirty men.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1668"></td>
        <td id="LC1668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1669"></td>
        <td id="LC1669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who valuable gift-gems of the Geatmen[1] carried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1670"></td>
        <td id="LC1670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          As peace-offering thither, that he thirty men's grapple</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1671"></td>
        <td id="LC1671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       10 Has in his hand, the hero-in-battle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1672"></td>
        <td id="LC1672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1673"></td>
        <td id="LC1673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{God hath sent him to our rescue.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1674"></td>
        <td id="LC1674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1675"></td>
        <td id="LC1675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The holy Creator usward sent him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1676"></td>
        <td id="LC1676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To West-Dane warriors, I ween, for to render</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1677"></td>
        <td id="LC1677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Gainst Grendel's grimness gracious assistance:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1678"></td>
        <td id="LC1678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I shall give to the good one gift-gems for courage.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1679"></td>
        <td id="LC1679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 Hasten to bid them hither to speed them,[2]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1680"></td>
        <td id="LC1680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To see assembled this circle of kinsmen;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1681"></td>
        <td id="LC1681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Tell them expressly they're welcome in sooth to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1682"></td>
        <td id="LC1682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The men of the Danes." To the door of the building</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1683"></td>
        <td id="LC1683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1684"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1686"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1687"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1688"></td>
        <td id="LC1688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Wulfgar went then, this word-message shouted:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1689"></td>
        <td id="LC1689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 "My victorious liegelord bade me to tell you,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1690"></td>
        <td id="LC1690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The East-Danes' atheling, that your origin knows he,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1691"></td>
        <td id="LC1691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And o'er wave-billows wafted ye welcome are hither,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1692"></td>
        <td id="LC1692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Valiant of spirit. Ye straightway may enter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1693"></td>
        <td id="LC1693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Clad in corslets, cased in your helmets,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1694"></td>
        <td id="LC1694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 To see King Hrothgar. Here let your battle-boards,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1695"></td>
        <td id="LC1695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Wood-spears and war-shafts, await your conferring."</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1696"></td>
        <td id="LC1696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The mighty one rose then, with many a liegeman,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1697"></td>
        <td id="LC1697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          An excellent thane-group; some there did await them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1698"></td>
        <td id="LC1698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And as bid of the brave one the battle-gear guarded.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1699"></td>
        <td id="LC1699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 Together they hied them, while the hero did guide them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1700"></td>
        <td id="LC1700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Neath Heorot's roof; the high-minded went then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1701"></td>
        <td id="LC1701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Sturdy 'neath helmet till he stood in the building.</td>

        <td id="L1702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1702"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L1706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1706"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L1708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1708"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1709"></td>
        <td id="LC1709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And vassal forsooth; many a wonder</td>

        <td id="L1710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1710"></td>
        <td id="LC1710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I dared as a stripling. The doings of Grendel,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1711"></td>
        <td id="LC1711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In far-off fatherland I fully did know of:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1712"></td>
        <td id="LC1712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Sea-farers tell us, this hall-building standeth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1713"></td>
        <td id="LC1713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 Excellent edifice, empty and useless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1714"></td>
        <td id="LC1714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To all the earlmen after evenlight's glimmer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1715"></td>
        <td id="LC1715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Neath heaven's bright hues hath hidden its glory.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1716"></td>
        <td id="LC1716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          This my earls then urged me, the most excellent of them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1717"></td>
        <td id="LC1717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Carles very clever, to come and assist thee,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC1718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 Folk-leader Hrothgar; fully they knew of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1719"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1720"></td>
        <td id="LC1720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{His fight with the nickers.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1721"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1722"></td>
        <td id="LC1722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The strength of my body. Themselves they beheld me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1723"></td>

        <td id="L1724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1724"></td>
        <td id="LC1724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Foes I escaped from, where five[3] I had bound,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1725"></td>
        <td id="LC1725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[16]      The giant-race wasted, in the waters destroying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1726"></td>
        <td id="LC1726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 The nickers by night, bore numberless sorrows,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1727"></td>
        <td id="LC1727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The Weders avenged (woes had they suffered)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1728"></td>
        <td id="LC1728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Enemies ravaged; alone now with Grendel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1729"></td>
        <td id="LC1729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1730"></td>
        <td id="LC1730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{He intends to fight Grendel unaided.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1731"></td>
        <td id="LC1731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1732"></td>
        <td id="LC1732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I shall manage the matter, with the monster of evil,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1733"></td>
        <td id="LC1733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The giant, decide it. Thee I would therefore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1734"></td>
        <td id="LC1734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 Beg of thy bounty, Bright-Danish chieftain,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1735"></td>
        <td id="LC1735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Lord of the Scyldings, this single petition:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1736"></td>
        <td id="LC1736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Not to refuse me, defender of warriors,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1737"></td>
        <td id="LC1737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Friend-lord of folks, so far have I sought thee,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1738"></td>
        <td id="LC1738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That _I_ may unaided, my earlmen assisting me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1739"></td>
        <td id="LC1739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       60 This brave-mooded war-band, purify Heorot.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1740"></td>
        <td id="LC1740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I have heard on inquiry, the horrible creature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1741"></td>
        <td id="LC1741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1742"></td>
        <td id="LC1742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Since the monster uses no weapons,}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1743"></td>
        <td id="LC1743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1744"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1745"></td>
        <td id="LC1745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I this do scorn then, so be Higelac gracious,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1746"></td>
        <td id="LC1746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          My liegelord belovÃ¨d, lenient of spirit,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1747"></td>
        <td id="LC1747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       65 To bear a blade or a broad-fashioned target,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1748"></td>
        <td id="LC1748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A shield to the onset; only with hand-grip</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1749"></td>
        <td id="LC1749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1750"></td>
        <td id="LC1750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{I, too, shall disdain to use any.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1751"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1752"></td>
        <td id="LC1752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The foe I must grapple, fight for my life then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1753"></td>
        <td id="LC1753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Foeman with foeman; he fain must rely on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1754"></td>
        <td id="LC1754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The doom of the Lord whom death layeth hold of.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1755"></td>
        <td id="LC1755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1756"></td>
        <td id="LC1756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Should he crush me, he will eat my companions as he has eaten thy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1757"></td>
        <td id="LC1757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thanes.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1758"></td>
        <td id="LC1758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1759"></td>
        <td id="LC1759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       70 I ween he will wish, if he win in the struggle,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1760"></td>
        <td id="LC1760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To eat in the war-hall earls of the Geat-folk,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1761"></td>
        <td id="LC1761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Boldly to swallow[4] them, as of yore he did often</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1762"></td>
        <td id="LC1762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The best of the Hrethmen! Thou needest not trouble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1763"></td>
        <td id="LC1763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A head-watch to give me;[5] he will have me dripping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1764"></td>
        <td id="LC1764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1765"></td>
        <td id="LC1765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[17]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1766"></td>
        <td id="LC1766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1767"></td>
        <td id="LC1767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{In case of my defeat, thou wilt not have the trouble of burying me.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1768"></td>
        <td id="LC1768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1769"></td>
        <td id="LC1769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       75 And dreary with gore, if death overtake me,[6]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1770"></td>
        <td id="LC1770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Will bear me off bleeding, biting and mouthing me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1771"></td>
        <td id="LC1771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The hermit will eat me, heedless of pity,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1772"></td>
        <td id="LC1772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Marking the moor-fens; no more wilt thou need then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1773"></td>

        <td id="L1844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1844"></td>
        <td id="LC1844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Reminiscences of Beowulf's father, Ecgtheow.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1845"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L1846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1846"></td>
        <td id="LC1846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The fiercest of feuds thy father engaged in,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1847"></td>
        <td id="LC1847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 Heatholaf killed he in hand-to-hand conflict</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1848"></td>
        <td id="LC1848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Mid Wilfingish warriors; then the Wederish people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1849"></td>
        <td id="LC1849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          For fear of a feud were forced to disown him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1850"></td>
        <td id="LC1850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Thence flying he fled to the folk of the South-Danes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1851"></td>
        <td id="LC1851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[18]      The race of the Scyldings, o'er the roll of the waters;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1852"></td>
        <td id="LC1852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       10 I had lately begun then to govern the Danemen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1853"></td>
        <td id="LC1853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The hoard-seat of heroes held in my youth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1854"></td>
        <td id="LC1854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Rich in its jewels: dead was Heregar,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1855"></td>
        <td id="LC1855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          My kinsman and elder had earth-joys forsaken,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1856"></td>
        <td id="LC1856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Healfdene his bairn. He was better than I am!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1857"></td>
        <td id="LC1857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 That feud thereafter for a fee I compounded;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1858"></td>
        <td id="LC1858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          O'er the weltering waters to the Wilfings I sent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1859"></td>
        <td id="LC1859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Ornaments old; oaths did he swear me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1860"></td>
        <td id="LC1860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1861"></td>
        <td id="LC1861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Hrothgar recounts to Beowulf the horrors of Grendel's persecutions.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1862"></td>
        <td id="LC1862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1863"></td>
        <td id="LC1863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          It pains me in spirit to any to tell it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1864"></td>
        <td id="LC1864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          What grief in Heorot Grendel hath caused me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1865"></td>
        <td id="LC1865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 What horror unlooked-for, by hatred unceasing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1866"></td>
        <td id="LC1866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Waned is my war-band, wasted my hall-troop;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1867"></td>
        <td id="LC1867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Weird hath offcast them to the clutches of Grendel.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1868"></td>
        <td id="LC1868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          God can easily hinder the scather</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1869"></td>
        <td id="LC1869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          From deeds so direful. Oft drunken with beer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1870"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1871"></td>
        <td id="LC1871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{My thanes have made many boasts, but have not executed them.}</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1874"></td>

        <td id="L1875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1875"></td>
        <td id="LC1875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A grapple with Grendel, with grimmest of edges.</td>

        <td id="L1876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1876"></td>
        <td id="LC1876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then this mead-hall at morning with murder was reeking,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1877"></td>
        <td id="LC1877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The building was bloody at breaking of daylight,</td>

        <td id="L1878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1878"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1879"></td>
        <td id="LC1879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The folk-hall was gory: I had fewer retainers,</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1951"></td>
        <td id="LC1951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In care of the waters? And no one was able</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1952"></td>
        <td id="LC1952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Nor lief nor loth one, in the least to dissuade you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1953"></td>
        <td id="LC1953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Your difficult voyage; then ye ventured a-swimming,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1954"></td>
        <td id="LC1954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 Where your arms outstretching the streams ye did cover,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1955"></td>
        <td id="LC1955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The mere-ways measured, mixing and stirring them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1956"></td>
        <td id="LC1956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Glided the ocean; angry the waves were,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1957"></td>
        <td id="LC1957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With the weltering of winter. In the water's possession,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1958"></td>
        <td id="LC1958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Ye toiled for a seven-night; he at swimming outdid thee,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1959"></td>
        <td id="LC1959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 In strength excelled thee. Then early at morning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1960"></td>
        <td id="LC1960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          On the Heathoremes' shore the holm-currents tossed him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1961"></td>
        <td id="LC1961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Sought he thenceward the home of his fathers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1962"></td>
        <td id="LC1962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Beloved of his liegemen, the land of the Brondings,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1963"></td>
        <td id="LC1963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The peace-castle pleasant, where a people he wielded,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1964"></td>
        <td id="LC1964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[20]   25 Had borough and jewels. The pledge that he made thee</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1965"></td>
        <td id="LC1965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1966"></td>
        <td id="LC1966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Breca outdid you entirely.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1967"></td>
        <td id="LC1967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1968"></td>
        <td id="LC1968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The son of Beanstan hath soothly accomplished.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1969"></td>
        <td id="LC1969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then I ween thou wilt find thee less fortunate issue,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1970"></td>
        <td id="LC1970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1971"></td>
        <td id="LC1971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Much more will Grendel outdo you, if you vie with him in prowess.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1972"></td>
        <td id="LC1972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1973"></td>
        <td id="LC1973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Though ever triumphant in onset of battle,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1974"></td>
        <td id="LC1974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A grim grappling, if Grendel thou darest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1975"></td>
        <td id="LC1975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 For the space of a night near-by to wait for!"</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1976"></td>
        <td id="LC1976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1977"></td>
        <td id="LC1977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf retaliates.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1978"></td>
        <td id="LC1978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1979"></td>
        <td id="LC1979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Beowulf answered, offspring of Ecgtheow:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1980"></td>
        <td id="LC1980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          "My good friend Unferth, sure freely and wildly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1981"></td>
        <td id="LC1981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1982"></td>
        <td id="LC1982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{O friend Unferth, you are fuddled with beer, and cannot talk coherently.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1983"></td>
        <td id="LC1983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1984"></td>
        <td id="LC1984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Thou fuddled with beer of Breca hast spoken,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1985"></td>
        <td id="LC1985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hast told of his journey! A fact I allege it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1986"></td>
        <td id="LC1986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 That greater strength in the waters I had then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1987"></td>
        <td id="LC1987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Ills in the ocean, than any man else had.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1988"></td>
        <td id="LC1988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          We made agreement as the merest of striplings</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1989"></td>
        <td id="LC1989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Promised each other (both of us then were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1990"></td>
        <td id="LC1990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1991"></td>
        <td id="LC1991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{We simply kept an engagement made in early life.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1992"></td>
        <td id="LC1992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1993"></td>
        <td id="LC1993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Younkers in years) that we yet would adventure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1994"></td>
        <td id="LC1994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 Out on the ocean; it all we accomplished.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1995"></td>
        <td id="LC1995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          While swimming the sea-floods, sword-blade unscabbarded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1996"></td>
        <td id="LC1996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Boldly we brandished, our bodies expected</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1997"></td>
        <td id="LC1997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To shield from the sharks. He sure was unable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1998"></td>
        <td id="LC1998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1999"></td>
        <td id="LC1999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{He _could_ not excel me, and I _would_ not excel him.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2000"></td>
        <td id="LC2000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2001"></td>
        <td id="LC2001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To swim on the waters further than I could,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2002"></td>
        <td id="LC2002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 More swift on the waves, nor _would_ I from him go.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2003"></td>
        <td id="LC2003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then we two companions stayed in the ocean</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2004"></td>
        <td id="LC2004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2005"></td>
        <td id="LC2005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{After five days the currents separated us.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2006"></td>
        <td id="LC2006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2007"></td>
        <td id="LC2007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Five nights together, till the currents did part us,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2008"></td>
        <td id="LC2008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The weltering waters, weathers the bleakest,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2009"></td>
        <td id="LC2009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And nethermost night, and the north-wind whistled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2010"></td>
        <td id="LC2010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 Fierce in our faces; fell were the billows.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2011"></td>
        <td id="LC2011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The mere fishes' mood was mightily ruffled:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2012"></td>
        <td id="LC2012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And there against foemen my firm-knotted corslet,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2013"></td>
        <td id="LC2013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hand-jointed, hardy, help did afford me;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2014"></td>
        <td id="LC2014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          My battle-sark braided, brilliantly gilded,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2015"></td>
        <td id="LC2015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2016"></td>
        <td id="LC2016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{A horrible sea-beast attacked me, but I slew him.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2017"></td>
        <td id="LC2017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2018"></td>
        <td id="LC2018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 Lay on my bosom. To the bottom then dragged me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2019"></td>
        <td id="LC2019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A hateful fiend-scather, seized me and held me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2020"></td>
        <td id="LC2020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Grim in his grapple: 'twas granted me, nathless,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2021"></td>
        <td id="LC2021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To pierce the monster with the point of my weapon,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2022"></td>
        <td id="LC2022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          My obedient blade; battle offcarried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2023"></td>
        <td id="LC2023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       60 The mighty mere-creature by means of my hand-blow.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2024"></td>
        <td id="LC2024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2025"></td>

        <td id="L2038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2038"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2040"></td>
        <td id="LC2040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          "So ill-meaning enemies often did cause me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2041"></td>
        <td id="LC2041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Sorrow the sorest. I served them, in quittance,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2042"></td>
        <td id="LC2042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2043"></td>
        <td id="LC2043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{My dear sword always served me faithfully.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2044"></td>
        <td id="LC2044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2045"></td>
        <td id="LC2045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With my dear-lovÃ¨d sword, as in sooth it was fitting;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2046"></td>
        <td id="LC2046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          They missed the pleasure of feasting abundantly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2047"></td>
        <td id="LC2047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 Ill-doers evil, of eating my body,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2048"></td>
        <td id="LC2048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of surrounding the banquet deep in the ocean;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2049"></td>
        <td id="LC2049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But wounded with edges early at morning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2050"></td>
        <td id="LC2050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          They were stretched a-high on the strand of the ocean,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2051"></td>
        <td id="LC2051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2052"></td>
        <td id="LC2052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{I put a stop to the outrages of the sea-monsters.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2053"></td>
        <td id="LC2053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2054"></td>
        <td id="LC2054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Put to sleep with the sword, that sea-going travelers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2055"></td>
        <td id="LC2055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       10 No longer thereafter were hindered from sailing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2056"></td>
        <td id="LC2056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The foam-dashing currents. Came a light from the east,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2057"></td>
        <td id="LC2057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          God's beautiful beacon; the billows subsided,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2058"></td>
        <td id="LC2058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That well I could see the nesses projecting,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2059"></td>
        <td id="LC2059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2060"></td>
        <td id="LC2060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Fortune helps the brave earl.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2061"></td>
        <td id="LC2061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2062"></td>
        <td id="LC2062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The blustering crags. Weird often saveth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2063"></td>
        <td id="LC2063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 The undoomed hero if doughty his valor!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2064"></td>
        <td id="LC2064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But me did it fortune[1] to fell with my weapon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2065"></td>
        <td id="LC2065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Nine of the nickers. Of night-struggle harder</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2066"></td>
        <td id="LC2066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Neath dome of the heaven heard I but rarely,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2067"></td>
        <td id="LC2067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Nor of wight more woful in the waves of the ocean;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2068"></td>
        <td id="LC2068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 Yet I 'scaped with my life the grip of the monsters,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2069"></td>
        <td id="LC2069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2070"></td>
        <td id="LC2070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{After that escape I drifted to Finland.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2071"></td>
        <td id="LC2071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2072"></td>
        <td id="LC2072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Weary from travel. Then the waters bare me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2073"></td>
        <td id="LC2073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To the land of the Finns, the flood with the current,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2074"></td>
        <td id="LC2074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2075"></td>
        <td id="LC2075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{I have never heard of your doing any such bold deeds.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2076"></td>
        <td id="LC2076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2077"></td>
        <td id="LC2077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The weltering waves. Not a word hath been told me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2078"></td>
        <td id="LC2078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of deeds so daring done by thee, Unferth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2079"></td>
        <td id="LC2079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 And of sword-terror none; never hath Breca</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2080"></td>
        <td id="LC2080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          At the play of the battle, nor either of you two,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2081"></td>
        <td id="LC2081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Feat so fearless performÃ¨d with weapons</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2082"></td>
