      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2083"></td>
        <td id="LC2083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[22]      . . . . . . . . . . . . I utter no boasting;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2084"></td>
        <td id="LC2084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2085"></td>
        <td id="LC2085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{You are a slayer of brothers, and will suffer damnation, wise as you may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2086"></td>
        <td id="LC2086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2087"></td>
        <td id="LC2087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2088"></td>
        <td id="LC2088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 Though with cold-blooded cruelty thou killedst thy brothers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2089"></td>
        <td id="LC2089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Thy nearest of kin; thou needs must in hell get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2090"></td>
        <td id="LC2090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Direful damnation, though doughty thy wisdom.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2091"></td>
        <td id="LC2091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I tell thee in earnest, offspring of Ecglaf,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2092"></td>
        <td id="LC2092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Never had Grendel such numberless horrors,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2093"></td>
        <td id="LC2093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 The direful demon, done to thy liegelord,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2094"></td>
        <td id="LC2094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Harrying in Heorot, if thy heart were as sturdy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2095"></td>
        <td id="LC2095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2096"></td>
        <td id="LC2096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Had your acts been as brave as your words, Grendel had not ravaged your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2097"></td>
        <td id="LC2097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">land so long.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2098"></td>
        <td id="LC2098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2099"></td>
        <td id="LC2099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Thy mood as ferocious as thou dost describe them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2100"></td>
        <td id="LC2100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He hath found out fully that the fierce-burning hatred,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2101"></td>
        <td id="LC2101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The edge-battle eager, of all of your kindred,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2102"></td>
        <td id="LC2102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 Of the Victory-Scyldings, need little dismay him:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2103"></td>
        <td id="LC2103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Oaths he exacteth, not any he spares</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2104"></td>
        <td id="LC2104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2105"></td>
        <td id="LC2105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The monster is not afraid of the Danes,}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2106"></td>
        <td id="LC2106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2108"></td>
        <td id="LC2108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Killeth and feasteth, no contest expecteth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2109"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2110"></td>
        <td id="LC2110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{but he will soon learn to dread the Geats.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2111"></td>
        <td id="LC2111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2112"></td>
        <td id="LC2112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          From Spear-Danish people. But the prowess and valor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2113"></td>
        <td id="LC2113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 Of the earls of the Geatmen early shall venture</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2114"></td>
        <td id="LC2114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To give him a grapple. He shall go who is able</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2115"></td>
        <td id="LC2115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Bravely to banquet, when the bright-light of morning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2116"></td>
        <td id="LC2116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2117"></td>
        <td id="LC2117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{On the second day, any warrior may go unmolested to the mead-banquet.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2118"></td>
        <td id="LC2118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2119"></td>
        <td id="LC2119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Which the second day bringeth, the sun in its ether-robes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2120"></td>
        <td id="LC2120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          O'er children of men shines from the southward!"</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2121"></td>
        <td id="LC2121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 Then the gray-haired, war-famed giver of treasure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2122"></td>
        <td id="LC2122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2123"></td>
        <td id="LC2123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Hrothgar's spirits are revived.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2124"></td>
        <td id="LC2124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2125"></td>
        <td id="LC2125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Was blithesome and joyous, the Bright-Danish ruler</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2126"></td>
        <td id="LC2126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Expected assistance; the people's protector</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2127"></td>
        <td id="LC2127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2128"></td>
        <td id="LC2128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The old king trusts Beowulf. The heroes are joyful.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2129"></td>
        <td id="LC2129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2130"></td>
        <td id="LC2130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Heard from Beowulf his bold resolution.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2131"></td>
        <td id="LC2131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          There was laughter of heroes; loud was the clatter,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2132"></td>
        <td id="LC2132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 The words were winsome. Wealhtheow advanced then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2133"></td>
        <td id="LC2133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2134"></td>
        <td id="LC2134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Queen Wealhtheow plays the hostess.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2135"></td>
        <td id="LC2135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2136"></td>
        <td id="LC2136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Consort of Hrothgar, of courtesy mindful,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2137"></td>
        <td id="LC2137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gold-decked saluted the men in the building,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2138"></td>
        <td id="LC2138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And the freeborn woman the beaker presented</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2139"></td>
        <td id="LC2139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2140"></td>
        <td id="LC2140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{She offers the cup to her husband first.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2141"></td>
        <td id="LC2141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2142"></td>
        <td id="LC2142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To the lord of the kingdom, first of the East-Danes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2143"></td>
        <td id="LC2143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       60 Bade him be blithesome when beer was a-flowing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2144"></td>
        <td id="LC2144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Lief to his liegemen; he lustily tasted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2145"></td>
        <td id="LC2145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of banquet and beaker, battle-famed ruler.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2146"></td>
        <td id="LC2146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The Helmingish lady then graciously circled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2147"></td>
        <td id="LC2147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Mid all the liegemen lesser and greater:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2148"></td>
        <td id="LC2148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2149"></td>
        <td id="LC2149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[23]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2150"></td>
        <td id="LC2150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2151"></td>
        <td id="LC2151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{She gives presents to the heroes.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2152"></td>
        <td id="LC2152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2153"></td>
        <td id="LC2153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       65 Treasure-cups tendered, till time was afforded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2154"></td>
        <td id="LC2154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That the decorous-mooded, diademed folk-queen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2155"></td>
        <td id="LC2155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2156"></td>
        <td id="LC2156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Then she offers the cup to Beowulf, thanking God that aid has come.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2157"></td>
        <td id="LC2157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2158"></td>
        <td id="LC2158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Might bear to Beowulf the bumper o'errunning;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2159"></td>
        <td id="LC2159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          She greeted the Geat-prince, God she did thank,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2160"></td>
        <td id="LC2160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Most wise in her words, that her wish was accomplished,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2161"></td>
        <td id="LC2161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       70 That in any of earlmen she ever should look for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2162"></td>
        <td id="LC2162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Solace in sorrow. He accepted the beaker,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2163"></td>
        <td id="LC2163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Battle-bold warrior, at Wealhtheow's giving,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2164"></td>
        <td id="LC2164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2165"></td>
        <td id="LC2165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf states to the queen the object of his visit.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2166"></td>
        <td id="LC2166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2167"></td>
        <td id="LC2167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then equipped for combat quoth he in measures,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2168"></td>
        <td id="LC2168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Beowulf spake, offspring of Ecgtheow:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2169"></td>
        <td id="LC2169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       75 "I purposed in spirit when I mounted the ocean,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2170"></td>
        <td id="LC2170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2171"></td>
        <td id="LC2171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{I determined to do or die.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2172"></td>
        <td id="LC2172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          When I boarded my boat with a band of my liegemen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2174"></td>
        <td id="LC2174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I would work to the fullest the will of your people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2175"></td>
        <td id="LC2175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Or in foe's-clutches fastened fall in the battle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2176"></td>
        <td id="LC2176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Deeds I shall do of daring and prowess,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2177"></td>
        <td id="LC2177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       80 Or the last of my life-days live in this mead-hall."</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2178"></td>
        <td id="LC2178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          These words to the lady were welcome and pleasing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2179"></td>
        <td id="LC2179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The boast of the Geatman; with gold trappings broidered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2180"></td>
        <td id="LC2180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Went the freeborn folk-queen her fond-lord to sit by.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2181"></td>
        <td id="LC2181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2182"></td>
        <td id="LC2182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Glee is high.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2183"></td>
        <td id="LC2183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2184"></td>
        <td id="LC2184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then again as of yore was heard in the building</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2185"></td>
        <td id="LC2185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       85 Courtly discussion, conquerors' shouting,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2186"></td>
        <td id="LC2186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Heroes were happy, till Healfdene's son would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2187"></td>
        <td id="LC2187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Go to his slumber to seek for refreshing;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2188"></td>
        <td id="LC2188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          For the horrid hell-monster in the hall-building knew he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2189"></td>
        <td id="LC2189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A fight was determined,[2] since the light of the sun they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2190"></td>
        <td id="LC2190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       90 No longer could see, and lowering darkness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2191"></td>
        <td id="LC2191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          O'er all had descended, and dark under heaven</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2192"></td>
        <td id="LC2192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Shadowy shapes came shying around them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2193"></td>
        <td id="LC2193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2194"></td>
        <td id="LC2194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Hrothgar retires, leaving Beowulf in charge of the hall.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2195"></td>
        <td id="LC2195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2196"></td>
        <td id="LC2196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The liegemen all rose then. One saluted the other,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2197"></td>
        <td id="LC2197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hrothgar Beowulf, in rhythmical measures,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2198"></td>
        <td id="LC2198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       95 Wishing him well, and, the wassail-hall giving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2199"></td>
        <td id="LC2199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To his care and keeping, quoth he departing:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2200"></td>
        <td id="LC2200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[24]      "Not to any one else have I ever entrusted,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2201"></td>
        <td id="LC2201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But thee and thee only, the hall of the Danemen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2202"></td>
        <td id="LC2202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Since high I could heave my hand and my buckler.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2203"></td>
        <td id="LC2203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">      100 Take thou in charge now the noblest of houses;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2204"></td>
        <td id="LC2204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Be mindful of honor, exhibiting prowess,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2205"></td>
        <td id="LC2205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Watch 'gainst the foeman! Thou shalt want no enjoyments,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2206"></td>
        <td id="LC2206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Survive thou safely adventure so glorious!"</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2207"></td>
        <td id="LC2207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2208"></td>
        <td id="LC2208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    [1] The repetition of 'hwÃ¦Ã°ere' (574 and 578) is regarded by some</td>

</td>

        <td id="L2213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2213"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XI.</td>

      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L2223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2223"></td>
        <td id="LC2223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ALL SLEEP SAVE ONE.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L2226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2226"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2227"></td>
        <td id="LC2227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2228"></td>
        <td id="LC2228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then Hrothgar departed, his earl-throng attending him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2229"></td>
        <td id="LC2229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Folk-lord of Scyldings, forth from the building;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2230"></td>
        <td id="LC2230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The war-chieftain wished then Wealhtheow to look for,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2231"></td>
        <td id="LC2231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The queen for a bedmate. To keep away Grendel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2232"></td>
        <td id="LC2232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2233"></td>
        <td id="LC2233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{God has provided a watch for the hall.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2234"></td>
        <td id="LC2234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2235"></td>
        <td id="LC2235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 The Glory of Kings had given a hall-watch,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2236"></td>
        <td id="LC2236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          As men heard recounted: for the king of the Danemen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2237"></td>
        <td id="LC2237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He did special service, gave the giant a watcher:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2238"></td>
        <td id="LC2238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And the prince of the Geatmen implicitly trusted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2239"></td>
        <td id="LC2239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2240"></td>
        <td id="LC2240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf is self-confident}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2241"></td>
        <td id="LC2241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2242"></td>
        <td id="LC2242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His warlike strength and the Wielder's protection.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2243"></td>
        <td id="LC2243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">

      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2339"></td>
        <td id="LC2339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2340"></td>
        <td id="LC2340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Grendel comes from the fens.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2341"></td>
        <td id="LC2341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2342"></td>
        <td id="LC2342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Neath the cloudy cliffs came from the moor then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2343"></td>
        <td id="LC2343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Grendel going, God's anger bare he.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2344"></td>
        <td id="LC2344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The monster intended some one of earthmen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2345"></td>
        <td id="LC2345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In the hall-building grand to entrap and make way with:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2346"></td>
        <td id="LC2346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2347"></td>
        <td id="LC2347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{He goes towards the joyous building.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2348"></td>
        <td id="LC2348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2349"></td>
        <td id="LC2349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 He went under welkin where well he knew of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2350"></td>
        <td id="LC2350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The wine-joyous building, brilliant with plating,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2351"></td>
        <td id="LC2351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gold-hall of earthmen. Not the earliest occasion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2352"></td>
        <td id="LC2352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2353"></td>
        <td id="LC2353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{This was not his first visit there.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2354"></td>
        <td id="LC2354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2355"></td>
        <td id="LC2355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He the home and manor of Hrothgar had sought:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2356"></td>
        <td id="LC2356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Ne'er found he in life-days later nor earlier</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2357"></td>
        <td id="LC2357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       10 Hardier hero, hall-thanes[1] more sturdy!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2358"></td>
        <td id="LC2358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then came to the building the warrior marching,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2359"></td>
        <td id="LC2359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2360"></td>
        <td id="LC2360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{His horrid fingers tear the door open.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2361"></td>
        <td id="LC2361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2362"></td>
        <td id="LC2362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Bereft of his joyance. The door quickly opened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2363"></td>
        <td id="LC2363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          On fire-hinges fastened, when his fingers had touched it;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2364"></td>
        <td id="LC2364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The fell one had flung then--his fury so bitter--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2365"></td>
        <td id="LC2365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 Open the entrance. Early thereafter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2366"></td>
        <td id="LC2366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The foeman trod the shining hall-pavement,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2367"></td>
        <td id="LC2367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2368"></td>
        <td id="LC2368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{He strides furiously into the hall.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2369"></td>
        <td id="LC2369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2370"></td>
        <td id="LC2370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Strode he angrily; from the eyes of him glimmered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2371"></td>
        <td id="LC2371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A lustre unlovely likest to fire.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2372"></td>
        <td id="LC2372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He beheld in the hall the heroes in numbers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2373"></td>
        <td id="LC2373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 A circle of kinsmen sleeping together,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2374"></td>
        <td id="LC2374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2375"></td>
        <td id="LC2375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{He exults over his supposed prey.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2376"></td>
        <td id="LC2376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2377"></td>
        <td id="LC2377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A throng of thanemen: then his thoughts were exultant,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2378"></td>
        <td id="LC2378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He minded to sunder from each of the thanemen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2379"></td>
        <td id="LC2379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The life from his body, horrible demon,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2380"></td>
        <td id="LC2380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Ere morning came, since fate had allowed him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2381"></td>
        <td id="LC2381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2382"></td>
        <td id="LC2382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Fate has decreed that he shall devour no more heroes. Beowulf suffers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2383"></td>
        <td id="LC2383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from suspense.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2384"></td>
        <td id="LC2384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2385"></td>
        <td id="LC2385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 The prospect of plenty. Providence willed not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2386"></td>
        <td id="LC2386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To permit him any more of men under heaven</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2387"></td>
        <td id="LC2387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To eat in the night-time. Higelac's kinsman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2388"></td>
        <td id="LC2388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Great sorrow endured how the dire-mooded creature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2389"></td>
        <td id="LC2389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[27]      In unlooked-for assaults were likely to bear him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2390"></td>
        <td id="LC2390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 No thought had the monster of deferring the matter,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2391"></td>
        <td id="LC2391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2392"></td>
        <td id="LC2392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Grendel immediately seizes a sleeping warrior, and devours him.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2393"></td>
        <td id="LC2393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2394"></td>
        <td id="LC2394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But on earliest occasion he quickly laid hold of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2395"></td>
        <td id="LC2395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A soldier asleep, suddenly tore him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2396"></td>
        <td id="LC2396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Bit his bone-prison, the blood drank in currents,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2397"></td>
        <td id="LC2397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Swallowed in mouthfuls: he soon had the dead man's</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2398"></td>
        <td id="LC2398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 Feet and hands, too, eaten entirely.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2399"></td>
        <td id="LC2399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Nearer he strode then, the stout-hearted warrior</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2400"></td>
        <td id="LC2400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2401"></td>
        <td id="LC2401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf and Grendel grapple.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2402"></td>
        <td id="LC2402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2403"></td>
        <td id="LC2403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Snatched as he slumbered, seizing with hand-grip,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2404"></td>
        <td id="LC2404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Forward the foeman foined with his hand;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2405"></td>
        <td id="LC2405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Caught he quickly the cunning deviser,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2406"></td>
        <td id="LC2406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 On his elbow he rested. This early discovered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2407"></td>
        <td id="LC2407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The master of malice, that in middle-earth's regions,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2408"></td>
        <td id="LC2408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Neath the whole of the heavens, no hand-grapple greater</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2409"></td>
        <td id="LC2409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2410"></td>
        <td id="LC2410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The monster is amazed at Beowulf's strength.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2411"></td>
        <td id="LC2411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2412"></td>
        <td id="LC2412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In any man else had he ever encountered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2413"></td>
        <td id="LC2413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fearful in spirit, faint-mooded waxed he,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2414"></td>
        <td id="LC2414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 Not off could betake him; death he was pondering,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2415"></td>
        <td id="LC2415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2416"></td>
        <td id="LC2416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{He is anxious to flee.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2417"></td>
        <td id="LC2417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2418"></td>
        <td id="LC2418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Would fly to his covert, seek the devils' assembly:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2419"></td>
        <td id="LC2419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His calling no more was the same he had followed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2420"></td>
        <td id="LC2420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Long in his lifetime. The liege-kinsman worthy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2421"></td>
        <td id="LC2421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2422"></td>
        <td id="LC2422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf recalls his boast of the evening, and determines to fulfil it.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2423"></td>
        <td id="LC2423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2424"></td>
        <td id="LC2424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of Higelac minded his speech of the evening,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2425"></td>
        <td id="LC2425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 Stood he up straight and stoutly did seize him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2426"></td>
        <td id="LC2426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His fingers crackled; the giant was outward,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2427"></td>
        <td id="LC2427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The earl stepped farther. The famous one minded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2428"></td>
        <td id="LC2428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To flee away farther, if he found an occasion,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2429"></td>
        <td id="LC2429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And off and away, avoiding delay,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2430"></td>
        <td id="LC2430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 To fly to the fen-moors; he fully was ware of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2431"></td>
        <td id="LC2431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The strength of his grapple in the grip of the foeman.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2432"></td>
        <td id="LC2432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2433"></td>
        <td id="LC2433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{'Twas a luckless day for Grendel.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2434"></td>
        <td id="LC2434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2435"></td>
        <td id="LC2435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Twas an ill-taken journey that the injury-bringing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2436"></td>
        <td id="LC2436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Harrying harmer to Heorot wandered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2437"></td>
        <td id="LC2437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2438"></td>
        <td id="LC2438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The hall groans.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2439"></td>
        <td id="LC2439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2440"></td>
        <td id="LC2440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The palace re-echoed; to all of the Danemen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2441"></td>
        <td id="LC2441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       60 Dwellers in castles, to each of the bold ones,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2442"></td>
        <td id="LC2442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Earlmen, was terror. Angry they both were,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2443"></td>
        <td id="LC2443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Archwarders raging.[2] Rattled the building;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2444"></td>
        <td id="LC2444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[28]      'Twas a marvellous wonder that the wine-hall withstood then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2445"></td>
        <td id="LC2445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The bold-in-battle, bent not to earthward,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2446"></td>
        <td id="LC2446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       65 Excellent earth-hall; but within and without it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2447"></td>
        <td id="LC2447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Was fastened so firmly in fetters of iron,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2448"></td>
        <td id="LC2448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          By the art of the armorer. Off from the sill there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2449"></td>
        <td id="LC2449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Bent mead-benches many, as men have informed me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2450"></td>
        <td id="LC2450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Adorned with gold-work, where the grim ones did struggle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2451"></td>
        <td id="LC2451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       70 The Scylding wise men weened ne'er before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2452"></td>
        <td id="LC2452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That by might and main-strength a man under heaven</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2453"></td>
        <td id="LC2453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Might break it in pieces, bone-decked, resplendent,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2454"></td>
        <td id="LC2454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Crush it by cunning, unless clutch of the fire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2455"></td>
        <td id="LC2455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In smoke should consume it. The sound mounted upward</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2456"></td>
        <td id="LC2456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2457"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2458"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2459"></td>
        <td id="LC2459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       75 Novel enough; on the North Danes fastened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2460"></td>
        <td id="LC2460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A terror of anguish, on all of the men there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2461"></td>
        <td id="LC2461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who heard from the wall the weeping and plaining,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2462"></td>
        <td id="LC2462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The song of defeat from the foeman of heaven,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2463"></td>
        <td id="LC2463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Heard him hymns of horror howl, and his sorrow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2464"></td>
        <td id="LC2464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       80 Hell-bound bewailing. He held him too firmly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2465"></td>
        <td id="LC2465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who was strongest of main-strength of men of that era.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2466"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L2480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2480"></td>
        <td id="LC2480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">GRENDEL IS VANQUISHED.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2481"></td>
        <td id="LC2481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L2482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2482"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2483"></td>
        <td id="LC2483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf has no idea of letting Grendel live.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2484"></td>
        <td id="LC2484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2485"></td>
        <td id="LC2485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          For no cause whatever would the earlmen's defender</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2486"></td>
        <td id="LC2486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Leave in life-joys the loathsome newcomer,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2487"></td>
        <td id="LC2487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He deemed his existence utterly useless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2488"></td>
        <td id="LC2488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To men under heaven. Many a noble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2489"></td>
        <td id="LC2489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 Of Beowulf brandished his battle-sword old,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2490"></td>
        <td id="LC2490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Would guard the life of his lord and protector,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2491"></td>
        <td id="LC2491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The far-famous chieftain, if able to do so;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2492"></td>
        <td id="LC2492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          While waging the warfare, this wist they but little,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2493"></td>
        <td id="LC2493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Brave battle-thanes, while his body intending</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2494"></td>
        <td id="LC2494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2495"></td>
        <td id="LC2495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{No weapon would harm Grendel; he bore a charmed life.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2496"></td>
        <td id="LC2496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2497"></td>
        <td id="LC2497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       10 To slit into slivers, and seeking his spirit:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2498"></td>
        <td id="LC2498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That the relentless foeman nor finest of weapons</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2499"></td>
        <td id="LC2499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of all on the earth, nor any of war-bills</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2500"></td>
        <td id="LC2500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[29]      Was willing to injure; but weapons of victory</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2501"></td>
        <td id="LC2501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Swords and suchlike he had sworn to dispense with.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2502"></td>
        <td id="LC2502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 His death at that time must prove to be wretched,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2503"></td>
        <td id="LC2503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And the far-away spirit widely should journey</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2504"></td>
        <td id="LC2504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Into enemies' power. This plainly he saw then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2505"></td>
        <td id="LC2505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who with mirth[1] of mood malice no little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2506"></td>
        <td id="LC2506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Had wrought in the past on the race of the earthmen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2507"></td>
        <td id="LC2507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 (To God he was hostile), that his body would fail him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2508"></td>
        <td id="LC2508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But Higelac's hardy henchman and kinsman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2509"></td>
        <td id="LC2509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Held him by the hand; hateful to other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2510"></td>
        <td id="LC2510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2511"></td>
        <td id="LC2511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Grendel is sorely wounded.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2512"></td>
        <td id="LC2512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2513"></td>
        <td id="LC2513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Was each one if living. A body-wound suffered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2514"></td>
        <td id="LC2514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The direful demon, damage incurable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2515"></td>
        <td id="LC2515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2516"></td>
        <td id="LC2516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{His body bursts.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2517"></td>
        <td id="LC2517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2518"></td>
        <td id="LC2518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 Was seen on his shoulder, his sinews were shivered,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2519"></td>
        <td id="LC2519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His body did burst. To Beowulf was given</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2520"></td>
        <td id="LC2520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Glory in battle; Grendel from thenceward</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2521"></td>
        <td id="LC2521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Must flee and hide him in the fen-cliffs and marshes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2522"></td>
        <td id="LC2522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Sick unto death, his dwelling must look for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2523"></td>
        <td id="LC2523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 Unwinsome and woful; he wist the more fully</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2524"></td>
        <td id="LC2524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2525"></td>
        <td id="LC2525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The monster flees away to hide in the moors.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2526"></td>
        <td id="LC2526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2527"></td>
        <td id="LC2527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The end of his earthly existence was nearing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2528"></td>
        <td id="LC2528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His life-days' limits. At last for the Danemen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2529"></td>
        <td id="LC2529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          When the slaughter was over, their wish was accomplished.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2530"></td>
        <td id="LC2530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The comer-from-far-land had cleansed then of evil,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2531"></td>
        <td id="LC2531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 Wise and valiant, the war-hall of Hrothgar,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2532"></td>
        <td id="LC2532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Saved it from violence. He joyed in the night-work,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2533"></td>
        <td id="LC2533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In repute for prowess; the prince of the Geatmen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2534"></td>
        <td id="LC2534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          For the East-Danish people his boast had accomplished,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2535"></td>
        <td id="LC2535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Bettered their burdensome bale-sorrows fully,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2536"></td>
        <td id="LC2536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 The craft-begot evil they erstwhile had suffered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2537"></td>
        <td id="LC2537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And were forced to endure from crushing oppression,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2538"></td>
        <td id="LC2538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Their manifold misery. 'Twas a manifest token,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2539"></td>
        <td id="LC2539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2540"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2541"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2543"></td>
        <td id="LC2543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The arm and the shoulder (there was all of the claw</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 Of Grendel together) 'neath great-stretching hall-roof.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2545"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2546"></td>
        <td id="LC2546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    [1] It has been proposed to translate 'myrÃ°e' by _with sorrow_; but</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC2565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Stood round the gift-hall, as the story is told me:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2566"></td>
        <td id="LC2566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Folk-princes fared then from far and from near</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2568"></td>
        <td id="LC2568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 The footprints of the foeman. Few of the warriors</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2569"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2573"></td>
        <td id="LC2573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His parting from life pained very deeply,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2574"></td>
        <td id="LC2574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          How, weary in spirit, off from those regions</td>

        <td id="L2575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2575"></td>
        <td id="LC2575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In combats conquered he carried his traces,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2576"></td>
        <td id="LC2576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       10 Fated and flying, to the flood of the nickers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2577"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L2579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2579"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2581"></td>
        <td id="LC2581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The angry eddy was everywhere mingled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2582"></td>
        <td id="LC2582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And seething with gore, welling with sword-blood;[1]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2583"></td>
        <td id="LC2583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He death-doomed had hid him, when reaved of his joyance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2584"></td>
        <td id="LC2584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 He laid down his life in the lair he had fled to,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2585"></td>
        <td id="LC2585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His heathenish spirit, where hell did receive him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2586"></td>
        <td id="LC2586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Thence the friends from of old backward turned them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2587"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 Heroes on horses. There were heard very often</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC2593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Beowulf's praises; many often asserted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2594"></td>
        <td id="LC2594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That neither south nor north, in the circuit of waters,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2595"></td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>
