        <td id="LC2599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Mid bearers of war-shields, more worthy to govern,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2600"></td>
        <td id="LC2600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 'Neath the arch of the ether. Not any, however,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2601"></td>
        <td id="LC2601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Gainst the friend-lord muttered, mocking-words uttered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2602"></td>
        <td id="LC2602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2603"></td>
        <td id="LC2603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{But no word is uttered to derogate from the old king}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2604"></td>
        <td id="LC2604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of Hrothgar the gracious (a good king he).</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2606"></td>
        <td id="LC2606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Oft the famed ones permitted their fallow-skinned horses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2607"></td>
        <td id="LC2607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[31]      To run in rivalry, racing and chasing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2608"></td>
        <td id="LC2608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 Where the fieldways appeared to them fair and inviting,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2609"></td>
        <td id="LC2609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Known for their excellence; oft a thane of the folk-lord,[2]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2610"></td>
        <td id="LC2610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2611"></td>
        <td id="LC2611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The gleeman sings the deeds of heroes.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2612"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2614"></td>
        <td id="LC2614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who ancient traditions treasured in memory,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2615"></td>
        <td id="LC2615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          New word-groups found properly bound:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2616"></td>
        <td id="LC2616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 The bard after 'gan then Beowulf's venture</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2617"></td>
        <td id="LC2617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2618"></td>
        <td id="LC2618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{He sings in alliterative measures of Beowulf's prowess.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2619"></td>
        <td id="LC2619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2620"></td>
        <td id="LC2620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Wisely to tell of, and words that were clever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2621"></td>
        <td id="LC2621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To utter skilfully, earnestly speaking,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2622"></td>
        <td id="LC2622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Everything told he that he heard as to Sigmund's</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2623"></td>
        <td id="LC2623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2624"></td>
        <td id="LC2624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Also of Sigemund, who has slain a great fire-dragon.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2625"></td>
        <td id="LC2625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2626"></td>
        <td id="LC2626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Mighty achievements, many things hidden,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2627"></td>
        <td id="LC2627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 The strife of the WÃ¦lsing, the wide-going ventures</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2628"></td>
        <td id="LC2628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The children of men knew of but little,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2629"></td>
        <td id="LC2629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The feud and the fury, but Fitela with him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2630"></td>
        <td id="LC2630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          When suchlike matters he minded to speak of,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2631"></td>
        <td id="LC2631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Uncle to nephew, as in every contention</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2632"></td>
        <td id="LC2632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 Each to other was ever devoted:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2633"></td>
        <td id="LC2633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A numerous host of the race of the scathers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2634"></td>
        <td id="LC2634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          They had slain with the sword-edge. To Sigmund accrued then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2635"></td>
        <td id="LC2635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          No little of glory, when his life-days were over,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2636"></td>
        <td id="LC2636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Since he sturdy in struggle had destroyed the great dragon,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2637"></td>
        <td id="LC2637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 The hoard-treasure's keeper; 'neath the hoar-grayish stone he,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2638"></td>
        <td id="LC2638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The son of the atheling, unaided adventured</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2639"></td>
        <td id="LC2639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The perilous project; not present was Fitela,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2640"></td>
        <td id="LC2640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Yet the fortune befell him of forcing his weapon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2641"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2642"></td>
        <td id="LC2642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 Well-honored weapon; the worm was slaughtered.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2643"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2720"></td>
        <td id="LC2720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2721"></td>
        <td id="LC2721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2722"></td>
        <td id="LC2722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hrothgar discoursed (to the hall-building went he,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2723"></td>
        <td id="LC2723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He stood by the pillar,[1] saw the steep-rising hall-roof</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2724"></td>
        <td id="LC2724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gleaming with gold-gems, and Grendel his hand there):</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2725"></td>
        <td id="LC2725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2726"></td>
        <td id="LC2726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Hrothgar gives thanks for the overthrow of the monster.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2727"></td>
        <td id="LC2727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2728"></td>
        <td id="LC2728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          "For the sight we behold now, thanks to the Wielder</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2729"></td>
        <td id="LC2729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 Early be offered! Much evil I bided,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2730"></td>
        <td id="LC2730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Snaring from Grendel:[2] God can e'er 'complish</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2731"></td>
        <td id="LC2731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Wonder on wonder, Wielder of Glory!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2732"></td>
        <td id="LC2732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2733"></td>
        <td id="LC2733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{I had given up all hope, when this brave liegeman came to our aid.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2734"></td>
        <td id="LC2734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2735"></td>
        <td id="LC2735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But lately I reckoned ne'er under heaven</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2736"></td>
        <td id="LC2736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Comfort to gain me for any of sorrows,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2737"></td>
        <td id="LC2737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       10 While the handsomest of houses horrid with bloodstain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2738"></td>
        <td id="LC2738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gory uptowered; grief had offfrightened[3]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2739"></td>
        <td id="LC2739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Each of the wise ones who weened not that ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2740"></td>
        <td id="LC2740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The folk-troop's defences 'gainst foes they should strengthen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2741"></td>
        <td id="LC2741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Gainst sprites and monsters. Through the might of the Wielder</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2742"></td>
        <td id="LC2742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 A doughty retainer hath a deed now accomplished</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2743"></td>
        <td id="LC2743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Which erstwhile we all with our excellent wisdom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2744"></td>
        <td id="LC2744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2745"></td>
        <td id="LC2745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{If his mother yet liveth, well may she thank God for this son.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2746"></td>
        <td id="LC2746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2747"></td>
        <td id="LC2747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Failed to perform. May affirm very truly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2748"></td>
        <td id="LC2748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          What woman soever in all of the nations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2749"></td>
        <td id="LC2749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gave birth to the child, if yet she surviveth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2750"></td>
        <td id="LC2750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 That the long-ruling Lord was lavish to herward</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2751"></td>
        <td id="LC2751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In the birth of the bairn. Now, Beowulf dear,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2752"></td>
        <td id="LC2752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2753"></td>
        <td id="LC2753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Hereafter, Beowulf, thou shalt be my son.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2754"></td>
        <td id="LC2754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2755"></td>
        <td id="LC2755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Most excellent hero, I'll love thee in spirit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2756"></td>
        <td id="LC2756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          As bairn of my body; bear well henceforward</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2757"></td>
        <td id="LC2757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The relationship new. No lack shall befall thee</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2758"></td>
        <td id="LC2758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 Of earth-joys any I ever can give thee.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2759"></td>
        <td id="LC2759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Full often for lesser service I've given</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2760"></td>
        <td id="LC2760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[34]      Hero less hardy hoard-treasure precious,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2761"></td>
        <td id="LC2761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2762"></td>
        <td id="LC2762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Thou hast won immortal distinction.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2763"></td>
        <td id="LC2763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2764"></td>
        <td id="LC2764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To a weaker in war-strife. By works of distinction</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2765"></td>
        <td id="LC2765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Thou hast gained for thyself now that thy glory shall flourish</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2766"></td>
        <td id="LC2766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 Forever and ever. The All-Ruler quite thee</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2767"></td>
        <td id="LC2767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With good from His hand as He hitherto did thee!"</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2768"></td>
        <td id="LC2768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2769"></td>
        <td id="LC2769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf replies: I was most happy to render thee this service.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2770"></td>
        <td id="LC2770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2771"></td>
        <td id="LC2771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Beowulf answered, Ecgtheow's offspring:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2772"></td>
        <td id="LC2772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          "That labor of glory most gladly achieved we,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2773"></td>
        <td id="LC2773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The combat accomplished, unquailing we ventured</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2774"></td>
        <td id="LC2774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 The enemy's grapple; I would grant it much rather</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2775"></td>
        <td id="LC2775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Thou wert able to look at the creature in person,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2776"></td>
        <td id="LC2776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Faint unto falling, the foe in his trappings!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2777"></td>
        <td id="LC2777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          On murder-bed quickly I minded to bind him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2778"></td>
        <td id="LC2778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With firm-holding fetters, that forced by my grapple</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2779"></td>
        <td id="LC2779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 Low he should lie in life-and-death struggle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2780"></td>
        <td id="LC2780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Less his body escape; I was wholly unable,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2781"></td>
        <td id="LC2781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2782"></td>
        <td id="LC2782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{I could not keep the monster from escaping, as God did not will that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2783"></td>
        <td id="LC2783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2784"></td>
        <td id="LC2784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2785"></td>
        <td id="LC2785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Since God did not will it, to keep him from going,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2786"></td>
        <td id="LC2786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Not held him that firmly, hated opposer;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2787"></td>
        <td id="LC2787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Too swift was the foeman. Yet safety regarding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2788"></td>
        <td id="LC2788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 He suffered his hand behind him to linger,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2789"></td>
        <td id="LC2789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His arm and shoulder, to act as watcher;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2790"></td>
        <td id="LC2790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2791"></td>
        <td id="LC2791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{He left his hand and arm behind.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2792"></td>
        <td id="LC2792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2793"></td>
        <td id="LC2793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          No shadow of solace the woe-begone creature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2794"></td>
        <td id="LC2794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Found him there nathless: the hated destroyer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2795"></td>
        <td id="LC2795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Liveth no longer, lashed for his evils,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2796"></td>
        <td id="LC2796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 But sorrow hath seized him, in snare-meshes hath him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2797"></td>
        <td id="LC2797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Close in its clutches, keepeth him writhing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2798"></td>
        <td id="LC2798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In baleful bonds: there banished for evil</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2799"></td>
        <td id="LC2799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The man shall wait for the mighty tribunal,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2800"></td>
        <td id="LC2800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2801"></td>
        <td id="LC2801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{God will give him his deserts.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2802"></td>
        <td id="LC2802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2803"></td>
        <td id="LC2803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          How the God of glory shall give him his earnings."</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2804"></td>
        <td id="LC2804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 Then the soldier kept silent, son of old Ecglaf,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2805"></td>
        <td id="LC2805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2806"></td>
        <td id="LC2806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Unferth has nothing more to say, for Beowulf's actions speak louder than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2807"></td>
        <td id="LC2807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2808"></td>
        <td id="LC2808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2809"></td>
        <td id="LC2809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          From boasting and bragging of battle-achievements,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2810"></td>
        <td id="LC2810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Since the princes beheld there the hand that depended</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2811"></td>
        <td id="LC2811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Neath the lofty hall-timbers by the might of the nobleman,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2812"></td>
        <td id="LC2812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Each one before him, the enemy's fingers;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2813"></td>
        <td id="LC2813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       60 Each finger-nail strong steel most resembled,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2814"></td>
        <td id="LC2814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The heathen one's hand-spur, the hero-in-battle's</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2815"></td>

        <td id="LC2911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 Gold-plated, gleaming, be guided to hallward,</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3006"></td>
        <td id="LC3006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Compact between the Frisians and the Danes.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3007"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3008"></td>
        <td id="LC3008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Another great building to fully make ready,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3009"></td>
        <td id="LC3009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A hall and a high-seat, that half they might rule with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3010"></td>
        <td id="LC3010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The sons of the Jutemen, and that Folcwalda's son would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3011"></td>
        <td id="LC3011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Day after day the Danemen honor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3012"></td>
        <td id="LC3012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 When gifts were giving, and grant of his ring-store</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3013"></td>
        <td id="LC3013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To Hengest's earl-troop ever so freely,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3014"></td>
        <td id="LC3014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of his gold-plated jewels, as he encouraged the Frisians</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3015"></td>
        <td id="LC3015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L3016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3016"></td>
        <td id="LC3016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Equality of gifts agreed on.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3017"></td>
        <td id="LC3017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3019"></td>
        <td id="LC3019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A fast-binding compact; Finn unto Hengest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3020"></td>
        <td id="LC3020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 With no thought of revoking vowed then most solemnly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3021"></td>
        <td id="LC3021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The woe-begone remnant well to take charge of,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3022"></td>
        <td id="LC3022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His Witan advising; the agreement should no one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3023"></td>
        <td id="LC3023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          By words or works weaken and shatter,</td>

        <td id="L3024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3024"></td>
        <td id="LC3024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          By artifice ever injure its value,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3025"></td>
        <td id="LC3025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 Though reaved of their ruler their ring-giver's slayer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L3064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3064"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC3082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The survivors go to Friesland, the home of Finn.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3083"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3084"></td>
        <td id="LC3084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          "Then the warriors departed to go to their dwellings,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3085"></td>
        <td id="LC3085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Reaved of their friends, Friesland to visit,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3086"></td>
        <td id="LC3086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Their homes and high-city. Hengest continued</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3087"></td>
        <td id="LC3087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3088"></td>
        <td id="LC3088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Hengest remains there all winter, unable to get away.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3089"></td>
        <td id="LC3089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3090"></td>
        <td id="LC3090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Biding with Finn the blood-tainted winter,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3091"></td>
        <td id="LC3091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 Wholly unsundered;[1] of fatherland thought he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3092"></td>
        <td id="LC3092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Though unable to drive the ring-stemmÃ¨d vessel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3093"></td>
        <td id="LC3093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[40]      O'er the ways of the waters; the wave-deeps were tossing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3094"></td>
        <td id="LC3094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fought with the wind; winter in ice-bonds</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3095"></td>
        <td id="LC3095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Closed up the currents, till there came to the dwelling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3096"></td>
        <td id="LC3096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       10 A year in its course, as yet it revolveth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3097"></td>
        <td id="LC3097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          If season propitious one alway regardeth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3098"></td>
        <td id="LC3098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          World-cheering weathers. Then winter was gone,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3099"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3191"></td>
        <td id="LC3191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    [1] For 1130 (1) R. and Gr. suggest 'elne unflitme' as 1098 (1) reads.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3192"></td>
        <td id="LC3192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    The latter verse is undisputed; and, for the former, 'elne' would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3193"></td>
        <td id="LC3193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    as possible as 'ealles,' and 'unflitme' is well supported. Accepting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3194"></td>
        <td id="LC3194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    'elne unflitme' for both, I would suggest '_very peaceably_' for both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3195"></td>
        <td id="LC3195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    places: (1) _Finn to Hengest very peaceably vowed with oaths_, etc.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3196"></td>
        <td id="LC3196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    (2) _Hengest then still the slaughter-stained winter remained there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3197"></td>
        <td id="LC3197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    with Finn very peaceably_. The two passages become thus correlatives,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3198"></td>
        <td id="LC3198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    the second a sequel of the first. 'Elne,' in the sense of very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3199"></td>
        <td id="LC3199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    (swÃ­Ã°e), needs no argument; and 'unflitme' (from 'flÃ­tan') can, it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3200"></td>
        <td id="LC3200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    seems to me, be more plausibly rendered 'peaceful,' 'peaceable,' than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3201"></td>
        <td id="LC3201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    'contestable,' or 'conquerable.'</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3202"></td>
        <td id="LC3202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3203"></td>
        <td id="LC3203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    [2] Some scholars have proposed 'roden'; the line would then read:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3204"></td>
        <td id="LC3204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    _Then the building was reddened, etc._, instead of 'covered.' The 'h'</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3205"></td>
        <td id="LC3205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    may have been carried over from the three alliterating 'h's.'</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3288"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3476"></td>
        <td id="LC3476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3477"></td>
        <td id="LC3477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{This horrible creature came to avenge Grendel's death.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3478"></td>
        <td id="LC3478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3479"></td>
        <td id="LC3479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          By cramming discovered.[1] The quarrel she wreaked then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3480"></td>
        <td id="LC3480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That last night igone Grendel thou killedst</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3481"></td>
        <td id="LC3481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 In grewsomest manner, with grim-holding clutches,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3482"></td>
        <td id="LC3482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Since too long he had lessened my liege-troop and wasted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3483"></td>
        <td id="LC3483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          My folk-men so foully. He fell in the battle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3484"></td>
        <td id="LC3484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With forfeit of life, and another has followed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3485"></td>
        <td id="LC3485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A mighty crime-worker, her kinsman avenging,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3486"></td>
        <td id="LC3486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 And henceforth hath 'stablished her hatred unyielding,[2]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3487"></td>
        <td id="LC3487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          As it well may appear to many a liegeman,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3488"></td>
        <td id="LC3488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who mourneth in spirit the treasure-bestower,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3489"></td>
        <td id="LC3489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Her heavy heart-sorrow; the hand is now lifeless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3490"></td>
        <td id="LC3490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Which[3] availed you in every wish that you cherished.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3491"></td>
        <td id="LC3491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3492"></td>
        <td id="LC3492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{I have heard my vassals speak of these two uncanny monsters who lived in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3493"></td>
        <td id="LC3493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the moors.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3494"></td>
        <td id="LC3494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3495"></td>
        <td id="LC3495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 Land-people heard I, liegemen, this saying,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3496"></td>
        <td id="LC3496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Dwellers in halls, they had seen very often</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3497"></td>
        <td id="LC3497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A pair of such mighty march-striding creatures,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3498"></td>
        <td id="LC3498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Far-dwelling spirits, holding the moorlands:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3499"></td>
        <td id="LC3499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          One of them wore, as well they might notice,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3500"></td>
        <td id="LC3500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 The image of woman, the other one wretched</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3501"></td>
        <td id="LC3501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In guise of a man wandered in exile,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3502"></td>
        <td id="LC3502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Except he was huger than any of earthmen;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3503"></td>
        <td id="LC3503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Earth-dwelling people entitled him Grendel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3504"></td>
        <td id="LC3504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In days of yore: they know not their father,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3505"></td>
        <td id="LC3505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 Whe'r ill-going spirits any were borne him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3506"></td>
        <td id="LC3506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3507"></td>
        <td id="LC3507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The inhabit the most desolate and horrible places.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3508"></td>
        <td id="LC3508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3509"></td>
        <td id="LC3509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Ever before. They guard the wolf-coverts,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3510"></td>
        <td id="LC3510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Lands inaccessible, wind-beaten nesses,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3511"></td>
        <td id="LC3511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fearfullest fen-deeps, where a flood from the mountains</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3512"></td>
        <td id="LC3512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Neath mists of the nesses netherward rattles,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3513"></td>
        <td id="LC3513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 The stream under earth: not far is it henceward</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3514"></td>
        <td id="LC3514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Measured by mile-lengths that the mere-water standeth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3515"></td>
        <td id="LC3515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Which forests hang over, with frost-whiting covered,[4]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3516"></td>
        <td id="LC3516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[48]      A firm-rooted forest, the floods overshadow.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3517"></td>
        <td id="LC3517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          There ever at night one an ill-meaning portent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3518"></td>
        <td id="LC3518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 A fire-flood may see; 'mong children of men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3519"></td>
        <td id="LC3519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          None liveth so wise that wot of the bottom;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3520"></td>
        <td id="LC3520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Though harassed by hounds the heath-stepper seek for,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3521"></td>
        <td id="LC3521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3522"></td>
        <td id="LC3522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Even the hounded deer will not seek refuge in these uncanny regions.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3523"></td>
        <td id="LC3523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3524"></td>
        <td id="LC3524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fly to the forest, firm-antlered he-deer,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3525"></td>
        <td id="LC3525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Spurred from afar, his spirit he yieldeth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3526"></td>
        <td id="LC3526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 His life on the shore, ere in he will venture</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3527"></td>
        <td id="LC3527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To cover his head. Uncanny the place is:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3528"></td>
        <td id="LC3528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Thence upward ascendeth the surging of waters,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3529"></td>
        <td id="LC3529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Wan to the welkin, when the wind is stirring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3530"></td>
        <td id="LC3530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The weathers unpleasing, till the air groweth gloomy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3531"></td>
        <td id="LC3531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3532"></td>
        <td id="LC3532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{To thee only can I look for assistance.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3533"></td>
        <td id="LC3533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3534"></td>
        <td id="LC3534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 And the heavens lower. Now is help to be gotten</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3535"></td>
        <td id="LC3535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          From thee and thee only! The abode thou know'st not,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3536"></td>
        <td id="LC3536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The dangerous place where thou'rt able to meet with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3537"></td>
        <td id="LC3537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The sin-laden hero: seek if thou darest!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3538"></td>
        <td id="LC3538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          For the feud I will fully fee thee with money,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3539"></td>
        <td id="LC3539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       60 With old-time treasure, as erstwhile I did thee,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3540"></td>
        <td id="LC3540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With well-twisted jewels, if away thou shalt get thee."</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3541"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC3560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">BEOWULF SEEKS GRENDEL'S MOTHER.</td>

</td>
