      <tr>
        <td id="L3563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3563"></td>
        <td id="LC3563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Beowulf answered, Ecgtheow's son:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3564"></td>
        <td id="LC3564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3565"></td>
        <td id="LC3565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf exhorts the old king to arouse himself for action.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3566"></td>
        <td id="LC3566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3567"></td>
        <td id="LC3567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          "Grieve not, O wise one! for each it is better,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3568"></td>
        <td id="LC3568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His friend to avenge than with vehemence wail him;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3569"></td>
        <td id="LC3569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Each of us must the end-day abide of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3570"></td>
        <td id="LC3570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 His earthly existence; who is able accomplish</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3571"></td>
        <td id="LC3571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Glory ere death! To battle-thane noble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3572"></td>
        <td id="LC3572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Lifeless lying, 'tis at last most fitting.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3573"></td>
        <td id="LC3573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Arise, O king, quick let us hasten</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3574"></td>
        <td id="LC3574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To look at the footprint of the kinsman of Grendel!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3575"></td>
        <td id="LC3575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       10 I promise thee this now: to his place he'll escape not,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3576"></td>
        <td id="LC3576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To embrace of the earth, nor to mountainous forest,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3577"></td>
        <td id="LC3577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Nor to depths of the ocean, wherever he wanders.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3578"></td>
        <td id="LC3578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[49]      Practice thou now patient endurance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3579"></td>
        <td id="LC3579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of each of thy sorrows, as I hope for thee soothly!"</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3580"></td>
        <td id="LC3580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3581"></td>
        <td id="LC3581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Hrothgar rouses himself. His horse is brought.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3582"></td>
        <td id="LC3582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3583"></td>
        <td id="LC3583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 Then up sprang the old one, the All-Wielder thanked he,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3584"></td>
        <td id="LC3584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Ruler Almighty, that the man had outspoken.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3585"></td>
        <td id="LC3585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then for Hrothgar a war-horse was decked with a bridle,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3586"></td>
        <td id="LC3586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Curly-maned courser. The clever folk-leader</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3587"></td>
        <td id="LC3587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3588"></td>
        <td id="LC3588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{They start on the track of the female monster.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3589"></td>
        <td id="LC3589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3590"></td>
        <td id="LC3590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Stately proceeded: stepped then an earl-troop</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3591"></td>
        <td id="LC3591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 Of linden-wood bearers. Her footprints were seen then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3592"></td>
        <td id="LC3592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Widely in wood-paths, her way o'er the bottoms,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3593"></td>
        <td id="LC3593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Where she faraway fared o'er fen-country murky,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3594"></td>
        <td id="LC3594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Bore away breathless the best of retainers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3595"></td>
        <td id="LC3595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who pondered with Hrothgar the welfare of country.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3596"></td>
        <td id="LC3596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 The son of the athelings then went o'er the stony,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3597"></td>
        <td id="LC3597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Declivitous cliffs, the close-covered passes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3598"></td>
        <td id="LC3598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Narrow passages, paths unfrequented,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3599"></td>
        <td id="LC3599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Nesses abrupt, nicker-haunts many;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3600"></td>
        <td id="LC3600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          One of a few of wise-mooded heroes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3601"></td>
        <td id="LC3601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 He onward advanced to view the surroundings,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3602"></td>
        <td id="LC3602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Till he found unawares woods of the mountain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3603"></td>
        <td id="LC3603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          O'er hoar-stones hanging, holt-wood unjoyful;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3604"></td>
        <td id="LC3604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The water stood under, welling and gory.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3605"></td>
        <td id="LC3605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Twas irksome in spirit to all of the Danemen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3606"></td>
        <td id="LC3606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 Friends of the Scyldings, to many a liegeman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3607"></td>
        <td id="LC3607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3608"></td>
        <td id="LC3608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The sight of Ãschere's head causes them great sorrow.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3609"></td>
        <td id="LC3609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3610"></td>
        <td id="LC3610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Sad to be suffered, a sorrow unlittle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3611"></td>
        <td id="LC3611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To each of the earlmen, when to Ãschere's head they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3612"></td>
        <td id="LC3612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Came on the cliff. The current was seething</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3613"></td>
        <td id="LC3613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With blood and with gore (the troopers gazed on it).</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3614"></td>
        <td id="LC3614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 The horn anon sang the battle-song ready.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3615"></td>
        <td id="LC3615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The troop were all seated; they saw 'long the water then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3616"></td>
        <td id="LC3616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3617"></td>
        <td id="LC3617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The water is filled with serpents and sea-dragons.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3618"></td>
        <td id="LC3618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3619"></td>
        <td id="LC3619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Many a serpent, mere-dragons wondrous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3620"></td>
        <td id="LC3620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Trying the waters, nickers a-lying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3621"></td>
        <td id="LC3621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          On the cliffs of the nesses, which at noonday full often</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3622"></td>
        <td id="LC3622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 Go on the sea-deeps their sorrowful journey,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3623"></td>
        <td id="LC3623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Wild-beasts and wormkind; away then they hastened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3624"></td>
        <td id="LC3624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3625"></td>
        <td id="LC3625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{One of them is killed by Beowulf.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3626"></td>
        <td id="LC3626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3627"></td>
        <td id="LC3627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hot-mooded, hateful, they heard the great clamor,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3628"></td>
        <td id="LC3628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The war-trumpet winding. One did the Geat-prince</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3629"></td>
        <td id="LC3629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[50]      Sunder from earth-joys, with arrow from bowstring,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3630"></td>
        <td id="LC3630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 From his sea-struggle tore him, that the trusty war-missile</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3631"></td>
        <td id="LC3631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3632"></td>
        <td id="LC3632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The dead beast is a poor swimmer}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3633"></td>
        <td id="LC3633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3634"></td>
        <td id="LC3634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Pierced to his vitals; he proved in the currents</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3635"></td>
        <td id="LC3635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Less doughty at swimming whom death had offcarried.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3636"></td>
        <td id="LC3636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Soon in the waters the wonderful swimmer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3637"></td>
        <td id="LC3637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Was straitened most sorely with sword-pointed boar-spears,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3638"></td>
        <td id="LC3638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 Pressed in the battle and pulled to the cliff-edge;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3639"></td>
        <td id="LC3639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The liegemen then looked on the loath-fashioned stranger.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3640"></td>
        <td id="LC3640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3641"></td>
        <td id="LC3641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf prepares for a struggle with the monster.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3642"></td>
        <td id="LC3642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3643"></td>
        <td id="LC3643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Beowulf donned then his battle-equipments,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3644"></td>
        <td id="LC3644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Cared little for life; inlaid and most ample,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3645"></td>
        <td id="LC3645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The hand-woven corslet which could cover his body,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3646"></td>
        <td id="LC3646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       60 Must the wave-deeps explore, that war might be powerless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3647"></td>
        <td id="LC3647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To harm the great hero, and the hating one's grasp might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3648"></td>
        <td id="LC3648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Not peril his safety; his head was protected</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3649"></td>
        <td id="LC3649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          By the light-flashing helmet that should mix with the bottoms,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3650"></td>
        <td id="LC3650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Trying the eddies, treasure-emblazoned,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3651"></td>
        <td id="LC3651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       65 Encircled with jewels, as in seasons long past</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3652"></td>
        <td id="LC3652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The weapon-smith worked it, wondrously made it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3653"></td>
        <td id="LC3653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With swine-bodies fashioned it, that thenceforward no longer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3654"></td>
        <td id="LC3654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Brand might bite it, and battle-sword hurt it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3655"></td>
        <td id="LC3655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And that was not least of helpers in prowess</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3656"></td>
        <td id="LC3656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3657"></td>
        <td id="LC3657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{He has Unferth's sword in his hand.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3658"></td>
        <td id="LC3658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3659"></td>
        <td id="LC3659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       70 That Hrothgar's spokesman had lent him when straitened;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3660"></td>
        <td id="LC3660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And the hilted hand-sword was Hrunting entitled,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3661"></td>
        <td id="LC3661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Old and most excellent 'mong all of the treasures;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3662"></td>
        <td id="LC3662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Its blade was of iron, blotted with poison,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3663"></td>
        <td id="LC3663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hardened with gore; it failed not in battle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3664"></td>
        <td id="LC3664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       75 Any hero under heaven in hand who it brandished,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3665"></td>
        <td id="LC3665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who ventured to take the terrible journeys,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3666"></td>
        <td id="LC3666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The battle-field sought; not the earliest occasion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3667"></td>
        <td id="LC3667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That deeds of daring 'twas destined to 'complish.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3668"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3669"></td>
        <td id="LC3669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Unferth has little use for swords.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3670"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3671"></td>
        <td id="LC3671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Ecglaf's kinsman minded not soothly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3672"></td>
        <td id="LC3672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       80 Exulting in strength, what erst he had spoken</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3673"></td>
        <td id="LC3673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Drunken with wine, when the weapon he lent to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3674"></td>
        <td id="LC3674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A sword-hero bolder; himself did not venture</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3675"></td>
        <td id="LC3675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Neath the strife of the currents his life to endanger,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3676"></td>
        <td id="LC3676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[51]      To fame-deeds perform; there he forfeited glory,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3677"></td>
        <td id="LC3677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       85 Repute for his strength. Not so with the other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3678"></td>
        <td id="LC3678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          When he clad in his corslet had equipped him for battle.</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3691"></td>
        <td id="LC3691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          "Recall now, oh, famous kinsman of Healfdene,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3692"></td>
        <td id="LC3692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Prince very prudent, now to part I am ready,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3693"></td>
        <td id="LC3693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gold-friend of earlmen, what erst we agreed on,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3694"></td>
        <td id="LC3694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3695"></td>
        <td id="LC3695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{If I fail, act as a kind liegelord to my thanes,}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3696"></td>
        <td id="LC3696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3697"></td>
        <td id="LC3697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 Should I lay down my life in lending thee assistance,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3698"></td>
        <td id="LC3698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          When my earth-joys were over, thou wouldst evermore serve me</td>

        <td id="L3699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3699"></td>
        <td id="LC3699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In stead of a father; my faithful thanemen,</td>

        <td id="L3700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3700"></td>
        <td id="LC3700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          My trusty retainers, protect thou and care for,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3701"></td>
        <td id="LC3701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fall I in battle: and, Hrothgar belovÃ¨d,</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3706"></td>
        <td id="LC3706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Thou to me hast allotted. The lord of the Geatmen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3707"></td>
        <td id="LC3707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          May perceive from the gold, the Hrethling may see it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3708"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3709"></td>
        <td id="LC3709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{I should like my king to know how generous a lord I found thee to be.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3710"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3711"></td>
        <td id="LC3711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          When he looks on the jewels, that a gem-giver found I</td>

        <td id="L3712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3712"></td>
        <td id="LC3712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Good over-measure, enjoyed him while able.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3713"></td>
        <td id="LC3713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 And the ancient heirloom Unferth permit thou,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3714"></td>
        <td id="LC3714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The famed one to have, the heavy-sword splendid[1]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3715"></td>
        <td id="LC3715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The hard-edgÃ¨d weapon; with Hrunting to aid me,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3716"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3717"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3722"></td>
        <td id="LC3722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Was willing to wait for; the wave-current swallowed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3723"></td>
        <td id="LC3723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3724"></td>
        <td id="LC3724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{He is a whole day reaching the bottom of the sea.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3725"></td>
        <td id="LC3725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3726"></td>
        <td id="LC3726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The doughty-in-battle. Then a day's-length elapsed ere</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3727"></td>
        <td id="LC3727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He was able to see the sea at its bottom.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3728"></td>
        <td id="LC3728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Early she found then who fifty of winters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3729"></td>
        <td id="LC3729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 The course of the currents kept in her fury,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3730"></td>
        <td id="LC3730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Grisly and greedy, that the grim one's dominion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3731"></td>
        <td id="LC3731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L3732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3732"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3734"></td>
        <td id="LC3734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Grendel's mother knows that some one has reached her domains.}</td>

      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L3736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3736"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3737"></td>
        <td id="LC3737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Forth did she grab them, grappled the warrior</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3739"></td>
        <td id="LC3739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 His body unscathÃ¨d: the burnie out-guarded,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3740"></td>
        <td id="LC3740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That she proved but powerless to pierce through the armor,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3741"></td>
        <td id="LC3741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The limb-mail locked, with loath-grabbing fingers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3742"></td>
        <td id="LC3742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The sea-wolf bare then, when bottomward came she,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3743"></td>
        <td id="LC3743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L3745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3745"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3746"></td>
        <td id="LC3746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The ring-prince homeward, that he after was powerless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3747"></td>
        <td id="LC3747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 (He had daring to do it) to deal with his weapons,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3748"></td>
        <td id="LC3748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But many a mere-beast tormented him swimming,</td>

        <td id="L3749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3749"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3752"></td>
        <td id="LC3752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Flood-beasts no few with fierce-biting tusks did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3753"></td>
        <td id="LC3753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Break through his burnie, the brave one pursued they.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3754"></td>
        <td id="LC3754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The earl then discovered he was down in some cavern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3755"></td>
        <td id="LC3755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 Where no water whatever anywise harmed him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3756"></td>
        <td id="LC3756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And the clutch of the current could come not anear him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3757"></td>
        <td id="LC3757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Since the roofed-hall prevented; brightness a-gleaming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3758"></td>
        <td id="LC3758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fire-light he saw, flashing resplendent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3759"></td>
        <td id="LC3759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The good one saw then the sea-bottom's monster,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3760"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3763"></td>
        <td id="LC3763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 The mighty mere-woman; he made a great onset</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3764"></td>
        <td id="LC3764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With weapon-of-battle, his hand not desisted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3765"></td>
        <td id="LC3765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          From striking, that war-blade struck on her head then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3766"></td>
        <td id="LC3766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A battle-song greedy. The stranger perceived then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3767"></td>
        <td id="LC3767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3771"></td>
        <td id="LC3771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 But the falchion failed the folk-prince when straitened:</td>

        <td id="L3772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3772"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3854"></td>
        <td id="LC3854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L3855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3855"></td>
        <td id="LC3855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{and fells the female monster.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3856"></td>
        <td id="LC3856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3857"></td>
        <td id="LC3857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Broke through her bone-joints, the bill fully pierced her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3858"></td>
        <td id="LC3858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fate-cursÃ¨d body, she fell to the ground then:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3859"></td>
        <td id="LC3859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The hand-sword was bloody, the hero exulted.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3860"></td>
        <td id="LC3860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The brand was brilliant, brightly it glimmered,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3861"></td>
        <td id="LC3861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 Just as from heaven gemlike shineth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3862"></td>
        <td id="LC3862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The torch of the firmament. He glanced 'long the building,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3863"></td>
        <td id="LC3863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And turned by the wall then, Higelac's vassal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3864"></td>
        <td id="LC3864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Raging and wrathful raised his battle-sword</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3865"></td>
        <td id="LC3865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Strong by the handle. The edge was not useless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3866"></td>
        <td id="LC3866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 To the hero-in-battle, but he speedily wished to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3867"></td>
        <td id="LC3867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Give Grendel requital for the many assaults he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3868"></td>
        <td id="LC3868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Had worked on the West-Danes not once, but often,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3869"></td>
        <td id="LC3869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          When he slew in slumber the subjects of Hrothgar,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3870"></td>
        <td id="LC3870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Swallowed down fifteen sleeping retainers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3871"></td>
        <td id="LC3871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 Of the folk of the Danemen, and fully as many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3872"></td>
        <td id="LC3872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Carried away, a horrible prey.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3873"></td>
        <td id="LC3873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He gave him requital, grim-raging champion,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3874"></td>
        <td id="LC3874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3875"></td>
        <td id="LC3875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf sees the body of Grendel, and cuts off his head.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3876"></td>
        <td id="LC3876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3877"></td>
        <td id="LC3877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          When he saw on his rest-place weary of conflict</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3878"></td>
        <td id="LC3878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Grendel lying, of life-joys bereavÃ¨d,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3879"></td>
        <td id="LC3879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 As the battle at Heorot erstwhile had scathed him;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3880"></td>
        <td id="LC3880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His body far bounded, a blow when he suffered,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3881"></td>
        <td id="LC3881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Death having seized him, sword-smiting heavy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3882"></td>
        <td id="LC3882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And he cut off his head then. Early this noticed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3883"></td>
        <td id="LC3883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The clever carles who as comrades of Hrothgar</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3884"></td>
        <td id="LC3884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3885"></td>
        <td id="LC3885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The waters are gory.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3886"></td>
        <td id="LC3886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3887"></td>
        <td id="LC3887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 Gazed on the sea-deeps, that the surging wave-currents</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3888"></td>
        <td id="LC3888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Were mightily mingled, the mere-flood was gory:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3889"></td>
        <td id="LC3889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of the good one the gray-haired together held converse,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3890"></td>
        <td id="LC3890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3891"></td>
        <td id="LC3891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf is given up for dead.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3892"></td>
        <td id="LC3892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3893"></td>
        <td id="LC3893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The hoary of head, that they hoped not to see again</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3894"></td>
        <td id="LC3894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The atheling ever, that exulting in victory</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3895"></td>
        <td id="LC3895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 He'd return there to visit the distinguished folk-ruler:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3896"></td>
        <td id="LC3896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[55]      Then many concluded the mere-wolf had killed him.[1]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3897"></td>
        <td id="LC3897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The ninth hour came then. From the ness-edge departed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3898"></td>
        <td id="LC3898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The bold-mooded Scyldings; the gold-friend of heroes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3899"></td>
        <td id="LC3899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Homeward betook him. The strangers sat down then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3900"></td>
        <td id="LC3900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 Soul-sick, sorrowful, the sea-waves regarding:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3901"></td>
        <td id="LC3901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          They wished and yet weened not their well-loved friend-lord</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3902"></td>
        <td id="LC3902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3903"></td>
        <td id="LC3903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The giant-sword melts.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3904"></td>
        <td id="LC3904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3905"></td>
        <td id="LC3905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To see any more. The sword-blade began then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3906"></td>
        <td id="LC3906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The blood having touched it, contracting and shriveling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3907"></td>
        <td id="LC3907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With battle-icicles; 'twas a wonderful marvel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3908"></td>
        <td id="LC3908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 That it melted entirely, likest to ice when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3909"></td>
        <td id="LC3909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The Father unbindeth the bond of the frost and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3910"></td>
        <td id="LC3910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Unwindeth the wave-bands, He who wieldeth dominion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3911"></td>
        <td id="LC3911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of times and of tides: a truth-firm Creator.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3912"></td>
        <td id="LC3912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Nor took he of jewels more in the dwelling,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3913"></td>
        <td id="LC3913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 Lord of the Weders, though they lay all around him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3914"></td>
        <td id="LC3914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Than the head and the handle handsome with jewels;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3915"></td>
        <td id="LC3915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[56]      The brand early melted, burnt was the weapon:[2]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3916"></td>
        <td id="LC3916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          So hot was the blood, the strange-spirit poisonous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3917"></td>
        <td id="LC3917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3918"></td>
        <td id="LC3918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The hero swims back to the realms of day.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3919"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3920"></td>
        <td id="LC3920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That in it did perish. He early swam off then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3921"></td>
        <td id="LC3921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       60 Who had bided in combat the carnage of haters,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3922"></td>
        <td id="LC3922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Went up through the ocean; the eddies were cleansÃ¨d,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3923"></td>
        <td id="LC3923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The spacious expanses, when the spirit from farland</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3924"></td>
        <td id="LC3924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His life put aside and this short-lived existence.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3925"></td>
        <td id="LC3925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The seamen's defender came swimming to land then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3926"></td>
        <td id="LC3926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       65 Doughty of spirit, rejoiced in his sea-gift,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3927"></td>
        <td id="LC3927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The bulky burden which he bore in his keeping.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3928"></td>
        <td id="LC3928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The excellent vassals advanced then to meet him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3929"></td>
        <td id="LC3929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To God they were grateful, were glad in their chieftain,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3930"></td>
        <td id="LC3930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That to see him safe and sound was granted them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3931"></td>
        <td id="LC3931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       70 From the high-minded hero, then, helmet and burnie</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3932"></td>
        <td id="LC3932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Were speedily loosened: the ocean was putrid,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3933"></td>
        <td id="LC3933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The water 'neath welkin weltered with gore.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3934"></td>
        <td id="LC3934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Forth did they fare, then, their footsteps retracing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3935"></td>
        <td id="LC3935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Merry and mirthful, measured the earth-way,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3936"></td>
        <td id="LC3936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       75 The highway familiar: men very daring[3]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3937"></td>
        <td id="LC3937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Bare then the head from the sea-cliff, burdening</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3938"></td>
        <td id="LC3938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Each of the earlmen, excellent-valiant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3939"></td>
        <td id="LC3939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3940"></td>
        <td id="LC3940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{It takes four men to carry Grendel's head on a spear.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3941"></td>
        <td id="LC3941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3942"></td>
        <td id="LC3942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Four of them had to carry with labor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3943"></td>
        <td id="LC3943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The head of Grendel to the high towering gold-hall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3944"></td>
        <td id="LC3944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       80 Upstuck on the spear, till fourteen most-valiant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3945"></td>
        <td id="LC3945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And battle-brave Geatmen came there going</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3946"></td>
        <td id="LC3946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Straight to the palace: the prince of the people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3947"></td>
        <td id="LC3947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Measured the mead-ways, their mood-brave companion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3948"></td>
        <td id="LC3948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The atheling of earlmen entered the building,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3949"></td>
