      <tr>
        <td id="L4041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4041"></td>
        <td id="LC4041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Old-work of giants, was thereupon given;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4042"></td>
        <td id="LC4042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Since the fall of the fiends, it fell to the keeping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4043"></td>
        <td id="LC4043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 Of the wielder of Danemen, the wonder-smith's labor,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4044"></td>
        <td id="LC4044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And the bad-mooded being abandoned this world then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4045"></td>
        <td id="LC4045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Opponent of God, victim of murder,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4046"></td>
        <td id="LC4046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And also his mother; it went to the keeping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4047"></td>
        <td id="LC4047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of the best of the world-kings, where waters encircle,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4048"></td>
        <td id="LC4048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 Who the scot divided in Scylding dominion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4049"></td>
        <td id="LC4049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4050"></td>
        <td id="LC4050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Hrothgar looks closely at the old sword.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4051"></td>
        <td id="LC4051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4052"></td>
        <td id="LC4052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hrothgar discoursed, the hilt he regarded,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4053"></td>
        <td id="LC4053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The ancient heirloom where an old-time contention's</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4054"></td>
        <td id="LC4054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Beginning was graven: the gurgling currents,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4055"></td>
        <td id="LC4055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The flood slew thereafter the race of the giants,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4056"></td>
        <td id="LC4056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 They had proved themselves daring: that people was loth to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4057"></td>
        <td id="LC4057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4058"></td>
        <td id="LC4058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{It had belonged to a race hateful to God.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4059"></td>
        <td id="LC4059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4060"></td>
        <td id="LC4060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The Lord everlasting, through lash of the billows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4061"></td>
        <td id="LC4061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The Father gave them final requital.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4062"></td>
        <td id="LC4062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          So in letters of rune on the clasp of the handle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4063"></td>
        <td id="LC4063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gleaming and golden, 'twas graven exactly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4064"></td>
        <td id="LC4064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 Set forth and said, whom that sword had been made for,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4065"></td>
        <td id="LC4065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Finest of irons, who first it was wrought for,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4066"></td>
        <td id="LC4066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Wreathed at its handle and gleaming with serpents.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4067"></td>
        <td id="LC4067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The wise one then said (silent they all were)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4068"></td>
        <td id="LC4068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4069"></td>
        <td id="LC4069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Hrothgar praises Beowulf.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4070"></td>
        <td id="LC4070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4071"></td>
        <td id="LC4071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Son of old Healfdene: "He may say unrefuted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4072"></td>
        <td id="LC4072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 Who performs 'mid the folk-men fairness and truth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4073"></td>
        <td id="LC4073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          (The hoary old ruler remembers the past),</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4074"></td>
        <td id="LC4074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That better by birth is this bairn of the nobles!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4075"></td>
        <td id="LC4075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Thy fame is extended through far-away countries,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4076"></td>
        <td id="LC4076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Good friend Beowulf, o'er all of the races,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4077"></td>
        <td id="LC4077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 Thou holdest all firmly, hero-like strength with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4078"></td>
        <td id="LC4078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Prudence of spirit. I'll prove myself grateful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4079"></td>
        <td id="LC4079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          As before we agreed on; thou granted for long shalt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4080"></td>
        <td id="LC4080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Become a great comfort to kinsmen and comrades,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4081"></td>
        <td id="LC4081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4082"></td>
        <td id="LC4082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Heremod's career is again contrasted with Beowulf's.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4083"></td>
        <td id="LC4083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4084"></td>
        <td id="LC4084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A help unto heroes. Heremod became not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4085"></td>
        <td id="LC4085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       60 Such to the Scyldings, successors of Ecgwela;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4086"></td>
        <td id="LC4086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He grew not to please them, but grievous destruction,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4087"></td>
        <td id="LC4087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[59]      And diresome death-woes to Danemen attracted;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4088"></td>
        <td id="LC4088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He slew in anger his table-companions,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4089"></td>
        <td id="LC4089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Trustworthy counsellors, till he turned off lonely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4090"></td>
        <td id="LC4090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       65 From world-joys away, wide-famous ruler:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4091"></td>
        <td id="LC4091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Though high-ruling heaven in hero-strength raised him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4092"></td>
        <td id="LC4092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In might exalted him, o'er men of all nations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4093"></td>
        <td id="LC4093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Made him supreme, yet a murderous spirit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4094"></td>
        <td id="LC4094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Grew in his bosom: he gave then no ring-gems</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4095"></td>
        <td id="LC4095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4096"></td>
        <td id="LC4096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{A wretched failure of a king, to give no jewels to his retainers.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4097"></td>
        <td id="LC4097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4098"></td>
        <td id="LC4098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       70 To the Danes after custom; endured he unjoyful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4099"></td>
        <td id="LC4099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Standing the straits from strife that was raging,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4100"></td>
        <td id="LC4100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Longsome folk-sorrow. Learn then from this,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4101"></td>
        <td id="LC4101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Lay hold of virtue! Though laden with winters,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4102"></td>
        <td id="LC4102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I have sung thee these measures. 'Tis a marvel to tell it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4103"></td>
        <td id="LC4103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4104"></td>
        <td id="LC4104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Hrothgar moralizes.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4105"></td>
        <td id="LC4105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4106"></td>
        <td id="LC4106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       75 How all-ruling God from greatness of spirit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4107"></td>
        <td id="LC4107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Giveth wisdom to children of men,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4108"></td>
        <td id="LC4108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Manor and earlship: all things He ruleth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4109"></td>
        <td id="LC4109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He often permitteth the mood-thought of man of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4110"></td>
        <td id="LC4110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The illustrious lineage to lean to possessions,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4111"></td>
        <td id="LC4111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       80 Allows him earthly delights at his manor,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4112"></td>
        <td id="LC4112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A high-burg of heroes to hold in his keeping,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4113"></td>
        <td id="LC4113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Maketh portions of earth-folk hear him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4114"></td>
        <td id="LC4114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And a wide-reaching kingdom so that, wisdom failing him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4115"></td>
        <td id="LC4115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He himself is unable to reckon its boundaries;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4116"></td>
        <td id="LC4116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       85 He liveth in luxury, little debars him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4117"></td>
        <td id="LC4117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Nor sickness nor age, no treachery-sorrow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4118"></td>
        <td id="LC4118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Becloudeth his spirit, conflict nowhere,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4119"></td>
        <td id="LC4119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          No sword-hate, appeareth, but all of the world doth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4120"></td>
        <td id="LC4120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Wend as he wisheth; the worse he knoweth not,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4121"></td>
        <td id="LC4121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       90 Till arrant arrogance inward pervading,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4122"></td>
        <td id="LC4122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Waxeth and springeth, when the warder is sleeping,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4123"></td>
        <td id="LC4123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The guard of the soul: with sorrows encompassed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4124"></td>
        <td id="LC4124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Too sound is his slumber, the slayer is near him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4125"></td>
        <td id="LC4125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who with bow and arrow aimeth in malice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4126"></td>
        <td id="LC4126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4127"></td>
        <td id="LC4127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[60]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4128"></td>
        <td id="LC4128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4129"></td>
        <td id="LC4129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    [1] Or rather, perhaps, '_the inlaid, or damaskeened weapon_.' Cf.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4130"></td>
        <td id="LC4130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    24_57 and note.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4131"></td>
        <td id="LC4131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4132"></td>
        <td id="LC4132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4133"></td>
        <td id="LC4133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4134"></td>
        <td id="LC4134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4135"></td>
        <td id="LC4135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XXVI.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4136"></td>
        <td id="LC4136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4137"></td>
        <td id="LC4137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">HROTHGAR MORALIZES.--REST AFTER LABOR.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4138"></td>
        <td id="LC4138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4139"></td>
        <td id="LC4139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4140"></td>
        <td id="LC4140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{A wounded spirit.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4141"></td>
        <td id="LC4141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4142"></td>
        <td id="LC4142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          "Then bruised in his bosom he with bitter-toothed missile</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4143"></td>
        <td id="LC4143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Is hurt 'neath his helmet: from harmful pollution</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4144"></td>
        <td id="LC4144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He is powerless to shield him by the wonderful mandates</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4145"></td>
        <td id="LC4145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of the loath-cursÃ¨d spirit; what too long he hath holden</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4146"></td>
        <td id="LC4146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 Him seemeth too small, savage he hoardeth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4147"></td>
        <td id="LC4147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Nor boastfully giveth gold-plated rings,[1]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4148"></td>
        <td id="LC4148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The fate of the future flouts and forgetteth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4149"></td>
        <td id="LC4149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Since God had erst given him greatness no little,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4150"></td>
        <td id="LC4150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Wielder of Glory. His end-day anear,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4151"></td>
        <td id="LC4151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       10 It afterward happens that the bodily-dwelling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4152"></td>
        <td id="LC4152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fleetingly fadeth, falls into ruins;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4153"></td>
        <td id="LC4153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Another lays hold who doleth the ornaments,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4154"></td>
        <td id="LC4154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The nobleman's jewels, nothing lamenting,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4155"></td>
        <td id="LC4155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Heedeth no terror. Oh, Beowulf dear,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4156"></td>
        <td id="LC4156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 Best of the heroes, from bale-strife defend thee,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4157"></td>
        <td id="LC4157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And choose thee the better, counsels eternal;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4158"></td>
        <td id="LC4158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4159"></td>
        <td id="LC4159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Be not over proud: life is fleeting, and its strength soon wasteth away.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4160"></td>
        <td id="LC4160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4161"></td>
        <td id="LC4161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Beware of arrogance, world-famous champion!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4162"></td>
        <td id="LC4162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But a little-while lasts thy life-vigor's fulness;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4163"></td>
        <td id="LC4163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Twill after hap early, that illness or sword-edge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4164"></td>
        <td id="LC4164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 Shall part thee from strength, or the grasp of the fire,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4165"></td>
        <td id="LC4165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Or the wave of the current, or clutch of the edges,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4166"></td>
        <td id="LC4166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Or flight of the war-spear, or age with its horrors,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4167"></td>
        <td id="LC4167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Or thine eyes' bright flashing shall fade into darkness:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4168"></td>
        <td id="LC4168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Twill happen full early, excellent hero,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4169"></td>
        <td id="LC4169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4170"></td>
        <td id="LC4170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Hrothgar gives an account of his reign.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4171"></td>
        <td id="LC4171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4172"></td>
        <td id="LC4172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 That death shall subdue thee. So the Danes a half-century</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4173"></td>
        <td id="LC4173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I held under heaven, helped them in struggles</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4174"></td>
        <td id="LC4174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Gainst many a race in middle-earth's regions,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4175"></td>
        <td id="LC4175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With ash-wood and edges, that enemies none</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4176"></td>
        <td id="LC4176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          On earth molested me. Lo! offsetting change, now,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4177"></td>
        <td id="LC4177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4178"></td>
        <td id="LC4178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[61]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4179"></td>
        <td id="LC4179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4180"></td>
        <td id="LC4180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Sorrow after joy.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4181"></td>
        <td id="LC4181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4182"></td>
        <td id="LC4182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 Came to my manor, grief after joyance,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4183"></td>
        <td id="LC4183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          When Grendel became my constant visitor,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4184"></td>
        <td id="LC4184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Inveterate hater: I from that malice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4185"></td>
        <td id="LC4185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Continually travailed with trouble no little.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4186"></td>
        <td id="LC4186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Thanks be to God that I gained in my lifetime,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4187"></td>
        <td id="LC4187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 To the Lord everlasting, to look on the gory</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4188"></td>
        <td id="LC4188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Head with mine eyes, after long-lasting sorrow!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4189"></td>
        <td id="LC4189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Go to the bench now, battle-adornÃ¨d</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4190"></td>
        <td id="LC4190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Joy in the feasting: of jewels in common</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4191"></td>
        <td id="LC4191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          We'll meet with many when morning appeareth."</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4192"></td>
        <td id="LC4192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 The Geatman was gladsome, ganged he immediately</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4193"></td>
        <td id="LC4193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To go to the bench, as the clever one bade him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4194"></td>
        <td id="LC4194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then again as before were the famous-for-prowess,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4195"></td>
        <td id="LC4195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hall-inhabiters, handsomely banqueted,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4196"></td>
        <td id="LC4196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Feasted anew. The night-veil fell then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4197"></td>
        <td id="LC4197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 Dark o'er the warriors. The courtiers rose then;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4198"></td>
        <td id="LC4198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The gray-haired was anxious to go to his slumbers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4199"></td>
        <td id="LC4199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The hoary old Scylding. Hankered the Geatman,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4200"></td>
        <td id="LC4200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4201"></td>
        <td id="LC4201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf is fagged, and seeks rest.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4202"></td>
        <td id="LC4202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4203"></td>
        <td id="LC4203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The champion doughty, greatly, to rest him:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4204"></td>
        <td id="LC4204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          An earlman early outward did lead him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4205"></td>
        <td id="LC4205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 Fagged from his faring, from far-country springing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4206"></td>
        <td id="LC4206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who for etiquette's sake all of a liegeman's</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4207"></td>
        <td id="LC4207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Needs regarded, such as seamen at that time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4208"></td>
        <td id="LC4208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Were bounden to feel. The big-hearted rested;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4209"></td>
        <td id="LC4209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The building uptowered, spacious and gilded,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4210"></td>
        <td id="LC4210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 The guest within slumbered, till the sable-clad raven</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4211"></td>
        <td id="LC4211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Blithely foreboded the beacon of heaven.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4212"></td>
        <td id="LC4212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then the bright-shining sun o'er the bottoms came going;[2]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4213"></td>
        <td id="LC4213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The warriors hastened, the heads of the peoples</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4214"></td>
        <td id="LC4214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Were ready to go again to their peoples,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4215"></td>
        <td id="LC4215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4216"></td>
        <td id="LC4216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The Geats prepare to leave Dane-land.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4217"></td>
        <td id="LC4217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4218"></td>
        <td id="LC4218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       60 The high-mooded farer would faraway thenceward</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4219"></td>
        <td id="LC4219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Look for his vessel. The valiant one bade then,[3]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4220"></td>
        <td id="LC4220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4221"></td>
        <td id="LC4221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[62]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4222"></td>
        <td id="LC4222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4223"></td>
        <td id="LC4223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Unferth asks Beowulf to accept his sword as a gift. Beowulf thanks him.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4224"></td>
        <td id="LC4224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4225"></td>
        <td id="LC4225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Offspring of Ecglaf, off to bear Hrunting,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4226"></td>
        <td id="LC4226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To take his weapon, his well-beloved iron;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4227"></td>
        <td id="LC4227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He him thanked for the gift, saying good he accounted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4228"></td>
        <td id="LC4228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       65 The war-friend and mighty, nor chid he with words then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4229"></td>
        <td id="LC4229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The blade of the brand: 'twas a brave-mooded hero.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4230"></td>
        <td id="LC4230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          When the warriors were ready, arrayed in their trappings,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4231"></td>
        <td id="LC4231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The atheling dear to the Danemen advanced then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4232"></td>
        <td id="LC4232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          On to the dais, where the other was sitting,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4233"></td>
        <td id="LC4233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       70 Grim-mooded hero, greeted King Hrothgar.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4234"></td>
        <td id="LC4234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4235"></td>
        <td id="LC4235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    [1] K. says '_proudly giveth_.'--Gr. says, '_And gives no gold-plated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4236"></td>
        <td id="LC4236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    rings, in order to incite the recipient to boastfulness_.'--B.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4237"></td>
        <td id="LC4237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    suggests 'gyld' for 'gylp,' and renders: _And gives no beaten rings</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4238"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4240"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4241"></td>
        <td id="LC4241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    light, going bright after darkness: the warriors, etc_.</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4243"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4244"></td>
        <td id="LC4244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    sword Hrunting, and B. thanks him for the gift. If, however, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4245"></td>
        <td id="LC4245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    suggestions of Grdtvg. and M. be accepted, the passage will read:</td>

        <td id="L4246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4246"></td>
        <td id="LC4246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    _Then the brave one (_i.e._ Beowulf) commanded that Hrunting be borne</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4247"></td>
        <td id="LC4247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    to the son of Ecglaf (Unferth), bade him take his sword, his dear</td>

        <td id="L4248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4248"></td>
        <td id="LC4248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    weapon; he (B.) thanked him (U.) for the loan, etc_.</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L4260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4260"></td>
        <td id="LC4260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Beowulf spake, Ecgtheow's offspring:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4261"></td>
        <td id="LC4261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          "We men of the water wish to declare now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4262"></td>
        <td id="LC4262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fared from far-lands, we're firmly determined</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4263"></td>
        <td id="LC4263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To seek King Higelac. Here have we fitly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4264"></td>
        <td id="LC4264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 Been welcomed and feasted, as heart would desire it;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4265"></td>
        <td id="LC4265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Good was the greeting. If greater affection</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4266"></td>
        <td id="LC4266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I am anywise able ever on earth to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4267"></td>
        <td id="LC4267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gain at thy hands, ruler of heroes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4268"></td>
        <td id="LC4268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Than yet I have done, I shall quickly be ready</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4269"></td>
        <td id="LC4269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4270"></td>
        <td id="LC4270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{I shall be ever ready to aid thee.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4271"></td>
        <td id="LC4271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4272"></td>
        <td id="LC4272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       10 For combat and conflict. O'er the course of the waters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4273"></td>
        <td id="LC4273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Learn I that neighbors alarm thee with terror,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4274"></td>
        <td id="LC4274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          As haters did whilom, I hither will bring thee</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4275"></td>
        <td id="LC4275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          For help unto heroes henchmen by thousands.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4276"></td>
        <td id="LC4276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4277"></td>
        <td id="LC4277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{My liegelord will encourage me in aiding thee.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4278"></td>
        <td id="LC4278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4279"></td>
        <td id="LC4279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I know as to Higelac, the lord of the Geatmen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4280"></td>
        <td id="LC4280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 Though young in years, he yet will permit me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4281"></td>
        <td id="LC4281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          By words and by works, ward of the people,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4282"></td>
        <td id="LC4282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fully to furnish thee forces and bear thee</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4283"></td>
        <td id="LC4283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          My lance to relieve thee, if liegemen shall fail thee,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4284"></td>
        <td id="LC4284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And help of my hand-strength; if Hrethric be treating,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4285"></td>
        <td id="LC4285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[63]   20 Bairn of the king, at the court of the Geatmen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4286"></td>
        <td id="LC4286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He thereat may find him friends in abundance:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4287"></td>
        <td id="LC4287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Faraway countries he were better to seek for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4288"></td>
        <td id="LC4288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who trusts in himself." Hrothgar discoursed then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4289"></td>
        <td id="LC4289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Making rejoinder: "These words thou hast uttered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4290"></td>
        <td id="LC4290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 All-knowing God hath given thy spirit!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4291"></td>
        <td id="LC4291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4292"></td>
        <td id="LC4292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{O Beowulf, thou art wise beyond thy years.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4293"></td>
        <td id="LC4293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4294"></td>
        <td id="LC4294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Ne'er heard I an earlman thus early in life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4295"></td>
        <td id="LC4295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          More clever in speaking: thou'rt cautious of spirit,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4296"></td>
        <td id="LC4296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Mighty of muscle, in mouth-answers prudent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4297"></td>
        <td id="LC4297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I count on the hope that, happen it ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4298"></td>
        <td id="LC4298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 That missile shall rob thee of Hrethel's descendant,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4299"></td>
        <td id="LC4299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Edge-horrid battle, and illness or weapon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4300"></td>
        <td id="LC4300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Deprive thee of prince, of people's protector,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4301"></td>
        <td id="LC4301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4302"></td>
        <td id="LC4302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Should Higelac die, the Geats could find no better successor than thou</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4303"></td>
        <td id="LC4303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wouldst make.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4304"></td>
        <td id="LC4304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4305"></td>
        <td id="LC4305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And life thou yet holdest, the Sea-Geats will never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4306"></td>
        <td id="LC4306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Find a more fitting folk-lord to choose them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4307"></td>
        <td id="LC4307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 Gem-ward of heroes, than _thou_ mightest prove thee,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4308"></td>
        <td id="LC4308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          If the kingdom of kinsmen thou carest to govern.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4309"></td>
        <td id="LC4309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Thy mood-spirit likes me the longer the better,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4310"></td>
        <td id="LC4310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Beowulf dear: thou hast brought it to pass that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4311"></td>
        <td id="LC4311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To both these peoples peace shall be common,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4312"></td>
        <td id="LC4312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4313"></td>
        <td id="LC4313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Thou hast healed the ancient breach between our races.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4314"></td>
        <td id="LC4314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4315"></td>
        <td id="LC4315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 To Geat-folk and Danemen, the strife be suspended,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4316"></td>
        <td id="LC4316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The secret assailings they suffered in yore-days;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4317"></td>
        <td id="LC4317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And also that jewels be shared while I govern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4318"></td>
        <td id="LC4318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The wide-stretching kingdom, and that many shall visit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4319"></td>
        <td id="LC4319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Others o'er the ocean with excellent gift-gems:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4320"></td>
        <td id="LC4320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 The ring-adorned bark shall bring o'er the currents</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4321"></td>
        <td id="LC4321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Presents and love-gifts. This people I know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4322"></td>
        <td id="LC4322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Tow'rd foeman and friend firmly established,[1]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4323"></td>
        <td id="LC4323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          After ancient etiquette everywise blameless."</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4324"></td>
        <td id="LC4324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then the warden of earlmen gave him still farther,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4325"></td>
        <td id="LC4325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC4421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Bade he up then take the treasure of princes,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4422"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4513"></td>
        <td id="LC4513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The wide-stretching shores. The world-candle glimmered,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4514"></td>
        <td id="LC4514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The sun from the southward; they proceeded then onward,</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4703"></td>
        <td id="LC4703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To Hondscio happened a hopeless contention,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4704"></td>
        <td id="LC4704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Death to the doomed one, dead he fell foremost,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4705"></td>
        <td id="LC4705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 Girded war-champion; to him Grendel became then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4706"></td>
        <td id="LC4706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To the vassal distinguished, a tooth-weaponed murderer,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4707"></td>
        <td id="LC4707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The well-beloved henchman's body all swallowed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4708"></td>
        <td id="LC4708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Not the earlier off empty of hand did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4709"></td>
        <td id="LC4709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The bloody-toothed murderer, mindful of evils,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4710"></td>
        <td id="LC4710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 Wish to escape from the gold-giver's palace,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4711"></td>
        <td id="LC4711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But sturdy of strength he strove to outdo me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4712"></td>
        <td id="LC4712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hand-ready grappled. A glove was suspended</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4713"></td>
        <td id="LC4713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Spacious and wondrous, in art-fetters fastened,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4714"></td>
        <td id="LC4714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Which was fashioned entirely by touch of the craftman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4715"></td>
        <td id="LC4715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 From the dragon's skin by the devil's devices:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4716"></td>
        <td id="LC4716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He down in its depths would do me unsadly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4717"></td>
        <td id="LC4717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          One among many, deed-doer raging,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4718"></td>
        <td id="LC4718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Though sinless he saw me; not so could it happen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4719"></td>
        <td id="LC4719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          When I in my anger upright did stand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4720"></td>
        <td id="LC4720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       60 'Tis too long to recount how requital I furnished</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4721"></td>
        <td id="LC4721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          For every evil to the earlmen's destroyer;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4722"></td>
        <td id="LC4722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4723"></td>
        <td id="LC4723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{I reflected honor upon my people.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4724"></td>
        <td id="LC4724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4725"></td>
        <td id="LC4725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Twas there, my prince, that I proudly distinguished</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4726"></td>
        <td id="LC4726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Thy land with my labors. He left and retreated,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4727"></td>
        <td id="LC4727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He lived his life a little while longer:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4728"></td>
        <td id="LC4728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       65 Yet his right-hand guarded his footstep in Heorot,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4729"></td>
        <td id="LC4729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And sad-mooded thence to the sea-bottom fell he,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4730"></td>
        <td id="LC4730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Mournful in mind. For the might-rush of battle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4731"></td>
        <td id="LC4731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4732"></td>
        <td id="LC4732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{King Hrothgar lavished gifts upon me.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4733"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4734"></td>
        <td id="LC4734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The friend of the Scyldings, with gold that was plated,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4735"></td>
        <td id="LC4735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With ornaments many, much requited me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4736"></td>
        <td id="LC4736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       70 When daylight had dawned, and down to the banquet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4737"></td>
        <td id="LC4737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          We had sat us together. There was chanting and joyance:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4738"></td>
        <td id="LC4738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The age-stricken Scylding asked many questions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4739"></td>
        <td id="LC4739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[72]      And of old-times related; oft light-ringing harp-strings,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4740"></td>
        <td id="LC4740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Joy-telling wood, were touched by the brave one;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4741"></td>
        <td id="LC4741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       75 Now he uttered measures, mourning and truthful,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4742"></td>
        <td id="LC4742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then the large-hearted land-king a legend of wonder</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4743"></td>
        <td id="LC4743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Truthfully told us. Now troubled with years</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4744"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4745"></td>
        <td id="LC4745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The old king is sad over the loss of his youthful vigor.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4746"></td>
        <td id="LC4746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4747"></td>
        <td id="LC4747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The age-hoary warrior afterward began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4748"></td>
        <td id="LC4748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Mourn for the might that marked him in youth-days;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4749"></td>
        <td id="LC4749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       80 His breast within boiled, when burdened with winters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4750"></td>
        <td id="LC4750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Much he remembered. From morning till night then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4751"></td>
        <td id="LC4751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          We joyed us therein as etiquette suffered,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4752"></td>
        <td id="LC4752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Till the second night season came unto earth-folk.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4753"></td>
        <td id="LC4753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then early thereafter, the mother of Grendel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4754"></td>
        <td id="LC4754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4755"></td>

        <td id="L4756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4756"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4757"></td>
        <td id="LC4757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       85 Was ready for vengeance, wretched she journeyed;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4758"></td>
        <td id="LC4758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Her son had death ravished, the wrath of the Geatmen.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4759"></td>
        <td id="LC4759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The horrible woman avengÃ¨d her offspring,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4760"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC4765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       90 Was ready to vanish; nor when morn had lightened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4766"></td>
        <td id="LC4766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Were they anywise suffered to consume him with fire,</td>

        <td id="L4767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4767"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4768"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4772"></td>
        <td id="LC4772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          She the corpse had offcarried in the clutch of the foeman[2]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4773"></td>
        <td id="LC4773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       95 'Neath mountain-brook's flood. To Hrothgar 'twas saddest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4774"></td>
        <td id="LC4774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of pains that ever had preyed on the chieftain;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4775"></td>
        <td id="LC4775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          By the life of thee the land-prince then me[3]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4776"></td>
        <td id="LC4776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Besought very sadly, in sea-currents' eddies</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4777"></td>
        <td id="LC4777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To display my prowess, to peril my safety,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4778"></td>
        <td id="LC4778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">      100 Might-deeds accomplish; much did he promise.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4779"></td>
        <td id="LC4779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4780"></td>
        <td id="LC4780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{I sought the creature in her den,}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4781"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4782"></td>
        <td id="LC4782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I found then the famous flood-current's cruel,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4783"></td>
        <td id="LC4783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Horrible depth-warder. A while unto us two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4784"></td>
        <td id="LC4784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[73]      Hand was in common; the currents were seething</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4785"></td>
        <td id="LC4785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With gore that was clotted, and Grendel's fierce mother's</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4786"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4788"></td>

</td>
