        <td id="L4789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4789"></td>
        <td id="LC4789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">      105 Head I offhacked in the hall at the bottom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4790"></td>
        <td id="LC4790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With huge-reaching sword-edge, hardly I wrested</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4791"></td>
        <td id="LC4791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          My life from her clutches; not doomed was I then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4792"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4793"></td>
        <td id="LC4793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Jewels were freely bestowed upon me.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4794"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4795"></td>
        <td id="LC4795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But the warden of earlmen afterward gave me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4796"></td>
        <td id="LC4796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Jewels in quantity, kinsman of Healfdene.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4797"></td>
        <td id="LC4797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4798"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4893"></td>

        <td id="LC4983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who hall-pleasures saw. No sword-bearer have I,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4984"></td>
        <td id="LC4984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And no one to burnish the gold-plated vessel,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC4985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The high-valued beaker: my heroes are vanished.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4986"></td>
        <td id="LC4986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The hardy helmet behung with gilding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4987"></td>
        <td id="LC4987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 Shall be reaved of its riches: the ring-cleansers slumber</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4988"></td>
        <td id="LC4988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who were charged to have ready visors-for-battle,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4989"></td>
        <td id="LC4989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And the burnie that bided in battle-encounter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4990"></td>
        <td id="LC4990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[77]      O'er breaking of war-shields the bite of the edges</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4991"></td>
        <td id="LC4991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Moulds with the hero. The ring-twisted armor,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4992"></td>
        <td id="LC4992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 Its lord being lifeless, no longer may journey</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4993"></td>
        <td id="LC4993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hanging by heroes; harp-joy is vanished,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4994"></td>
        <td id="LC4994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The rapture of glee-wood, no excellent falcon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4995"></td>
        <td id="LC4995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Swoops through the building, no swift-footed charger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4996"></td>
        <td id="LC4996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Grindeth the gravel. A grievous destruction</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4997"></td>
        <td id="LC4997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 No few of the world-folk widely hath scattered!"</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4998"></td>
        <td id="LC4998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          So, woful of spirit one after all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4999"></td>
        <td id="LC4999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Lamented mournfully, moaning in sadness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5000"></td>
        <td id="LC5000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          By day and by night, till death with its billows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5001"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L5004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5004"></td>
        <td id="LC5004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Dashed on his spirit. Then the ancient dusk-scather</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5005"></td>
        <td id="LC5005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 Found the great treasure standing all open,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5006"></td>
        <td id="LC5006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He who flaming and fiery flies to the barrows,</td>

        <td id="L5007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5007"></td>

        <td id="LC5008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Encompassed with fire; men under heaven</td>

        <td id="LC5009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Widely beheld him. 'Tis said that he looks for[4]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5010"></td>
        <td id="LC5010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 The hoard in the earth, where old he is guarding</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5011"></td>
        <td id="LC5011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The heathenish treasure; he'll be nowise the better.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L5069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5069"></td>

        <td id="L5070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5070"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5073"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5074"></td>
        <td id="LC5074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    suggest new readings to avoid the second 'hord.' This, however, is not</td>

        <td id="LC5075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    under the main stress, and, it seems to me, might easily be accepted.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5076"></td>
        <td id="LC5076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5077"></td>
        <td id="LC5077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    [6] The reading of H.-So. is well defended in the notes to that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5078"></td>
        <td id="LC5078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    volume. B. emends and renders: _Nor was there any man in that desert</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5079"></td>
        <td id="LC5079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    who rejoiced in conflict, in battle-work._ That is, the hoard-ward</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5080"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5258"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5259"></td>
        <td id="LC5259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          While the gold-friend of Geatmen gracious saluted</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5260"></td>
        <td id="LC5260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His fireside-companions: woe was his spirit,</td>

        <td id="LC5261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 Death-boding, wav'ring; Weird very near him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5262"></td>
        <td id="LC5262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who must seize the old hero, his soul-treasure look for,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5263"></td>
        <td id="LC5263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Dragging aloof his life from his body:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5264"></td>
        <td id="LC5264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Not flesh-hidden long was the folk-leader's spirit.</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5266"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC5267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf's retrospect.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5268"></td>
        <td id="LC5268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5269"></td>
        <td id="LC5269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 "I survived in my youth-days many a conflict,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5270"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5365"></td>
        <td id="LC5365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          O'er wide-stretching water warring was mutual,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5366"></td>
        <td id="LC5366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 Burdensome hatred, when Hrethel had perished,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5367"></td>
        <td id="LC5367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And Ongentheow's offspring were active and valiant,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5368"></td>
        <td id="LC5368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Wished not to hold to peace oversea, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5369"></td>
        <td id="LC5369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Round Hreosna-beorh often accomplished</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5370"></td>
        <td id="LC5370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Cruelest massacre. This my kinsman avengÃ¨d,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5371"></td>
        <td id="LC5371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 The feud and fury, as 'tis found on inquiry,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5372"></td>
        <td id="LC5372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Though one of them paid it with forfeit of life-joys,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5373"></td>
        <td id="LC5373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5374"></td>
        <td id="LC5374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{HÃ¦thcyn's fall at Ravenswood.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5375"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5376"></td>
        <td id="LC5376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With price that was hard: the struggle became then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5377"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5378"></td>
        <td id="LC5378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then I heard that at morning one brother the other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5379"></td>
        <td id="LC5379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 With edges of irons egged on to murder,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5380"></td>
        <td id="LC5380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Where Ongentheow maketh onset on Eofor:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5381"></td>
        <td id="LC5381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The helmet crashed, the hoary-haired Scylfing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5382"></td>
        <td id="LC5382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Sword-smitten fell, his hand then remembered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5383"></td>
        <td id="LC5383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Feud-hate sufficient, refused not the death-blow.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5384"></td>
        <td id="LC5384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5385"></td>
        <td id="LC5385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{I requited him for the jewels he gave me.}</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L5387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5387"></td>
        <td id="LC5387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 The gems that he gave me, with jewel-bright sword I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5388"></td>
        <td id="LC5388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Quited in contest, as occasion was offered:</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5389"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5390"></td>
        <td id="LC5390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Manor to live on. Little he needed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5391"></td>
        <td id="LC5391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          From Gepids or Danes or in Sweden to look for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5392"></td>
        <td id="LC5392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 Trooper less true, with treasure to buy him;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5393"></td>
        <td id="LC5393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Mong foot-soldiers ever in front I would hie me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5394"></td>
        <td id="LC5394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Alone in the vanguard, and evermore gladly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5395"></td>
        <td id="LC5395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Warfare shall wage, while this weapon endureth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5396"></td>
        <td id="LC5396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That late and early often did serve me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5397"></td>
        <td id="LC5397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5398"></td>
        <td id="LC5398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Beowulf refers to his having slain DÃ¦ghrefn.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5399"></td>
        <td id="LC5399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5400"></td>
        <td id="LC5400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 When I proved before heroes the slayer of DÃ¦ghrefn,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5401"></td>
        <td id="LC5401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Knight of the Hugmen: he by no means was suffered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5402"></td>
        <td id="LC5402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To the king of the Frisians to carry the jewels,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5403"></td>
        <td id="LC5403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The breast-decoration; but the banner-possessor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5404"></td>
        <td id="LC5404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Bowed in the battle, brave-mooded atheling.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5405"></td>
        <td id="LC5405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[85]   45 No weapon was slayer, but war-grapple broke then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5406"></td>
        <td id="LC5406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The surge of his spirit, his body destroying.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5407"></td>
        <td id="LC5407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Now shall weapon's edge make war for the treasure,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5408"></td>
        <td id="LC5408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And hand and firm-sword." Beowulf spake then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5409"></td>
        <td id="LC5409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Boast-words uttered--the latest occasion:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5410"></td>
        <td id="LC5410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5411"></td>
        <td id="LC5411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{He boasts of his youthful prowess, and declares himself still fearless.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5412"></td>
        <td id="LC5412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5413"></td>
        <td id="LC5413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 "I braved in my youth-days battles unnumbered;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5414"></td>
        <td id="LC5414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Still am I willing the struggle to look for,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5415"></td>
        <td id="LC5415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fame-deeds perform, folk-warden prudent,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5416"></td>
        <td id="LC5416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          If the hateful despoiler forth from his cavern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5417"></td>
        <td id="LC5417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Seeketh me out!" Each of the heroes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5418"></td>
        <td id="LC5418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 Helm-bearers sturdy, he thereupon greeted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5419"></td>
        <td id="LC5419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5420"></td>
        <td id="LC5420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{His last salutations.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5421"></td>
        <td id="LC5421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5422"></td>
        <td id="LC5422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          BelovÃ¨d co-liegemen--his last salutation:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5423"></td>
        <td id="LC5423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          "No brand would I bear, no blade for the dragon,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5424"></td>
        <td id="LC5424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Wist I a way my word-boast to 'complish[1]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5425"></td>
        <td id="LC5425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Else with the monster, as with Grendel I did it;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5426"></td>
        <td id="LC5426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       60 But fire in the battle hot I expect there,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5427"></td>
        <td id="LC5427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Furious flame-burning: so I fixed on my body</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5428"></td>
        <td id="LC5428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Target and war-mail. The ward of the barrow[2]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5429"></td>
        <td id="LC5429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I'll not flee from a foot-length, the foeman uncanny.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5430"></td>
        <td id="LC5430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          At the wall 'twill befall us as Fate decreeth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5431"></td>
        <td id="LC5431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5432"></td>
        <td id="LC5432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Let Fate decide between us.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5433"></td>
        <td id="LC5433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5434"></td>
        <td id="LC5434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       65 Each one's Creator. I am eager in spirit,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5435"></td>
        <td id="LC5435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With the wingÃ¨d war-hero to away with all boasting.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5436"></td>
        <td id="LC5436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Bide on the barrow with burnies protected,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5437"></td>
        <td id="LC5437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5438"></td>
        <td id="LC5438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Wait ye here till the battle is over.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5439"></td>
        <td id="LC5439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5440"></td>
        <td id="LC5440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Earls in armor, which of _us_ two may better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5441"></td>
        <td id="LC5441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Bear his disaster, when the battle is over.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5442"></td>
        <td id="LC5442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       70 'Tis no matter of yours, and man cannot do it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5443"></td>
        <td id="LC5443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But me and me only, to measure his strength with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5444"></td>
        <td id="LC5444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The monster of malice, might-deeds to 'complish.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5445"></td>
        <td id="LC5445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          I with prowess shall gain the gold, or the battle,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5446"></td>
        <td id="LC5446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[86]      Direful death-woe will drag off your ruler!"</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5447"></td>
        <td id="LC5447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       75 The mighty champion rose by his shield then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5448"></td>
        <td id="LC5448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Brave under helmet, in battle-mail went he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5449"></td>
        <td id="LC5449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Neath steep-rising stone-cliffs, the strength he relied on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5450"></td>
        <td id="LC5450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of one man alone: no work for a coward.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5451"></td>
        <td id="LC5451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then he saw by the wall who a great many battles</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5452"></td>
        <td id="LC5452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       80 Had lived through, most worthy, when foot-troops collided,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5453"></td>
        <td id="LC5453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5454"></td>
        <td id="LC5454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The place of strife is described.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5455"></td>
        <td id="LC5455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5456"></td>
        <td id="LC5456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Stone-arches standing, stout-hearted champion,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5457"></td>
        <td id="LC5457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Saw a brook from the barrow bubbling out thenceward:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5458"></td>
        <td id="LC5458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The flood of the fountain was fuming with war-flame:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5459"></td>
        <td id="LC5459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Not nigh to the hoard, for season the briefest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5460"></td>
        <td id="LC5460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       85 Could he brave, without burning, the abyss that was yawning,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5461"></td>
        <td id="LC5461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The drake was so fiery. The prince of the Weders</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5462"></td>
        <td id="LC5462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Caused then that words came from his bosom,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5463"></td>
        <td id="LC5463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          So fierce was his fury; the firm-hearted shouted:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5464"></td>
        <td id="LC5464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His battle-clear voice came in resounding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5465"></td>
        <td id="LC5465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       90 'Neath the gray-colored stone. Stirred was his hatred,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5466"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5470"></td>
        <td id="LC5470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Time was no longer to look out for friendship.</td>

        <td id="L5543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5543"></td>
        <td id="LC5543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">      135 Aught in him waver who well doth consider.</td>

        <td id="LC5549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    else I might combat the boastful defiance of the monster_.--The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5550"></td>
        <td id="LC5550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    translation turns upon 'wiÃ°grÃ­pan,' a word not understood.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5551"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5552"></td>
        <td id="LC5552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    [2] B. emends and translates: _I will not flee the space of a foot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5553"></td>
        <td id="LC5553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    from the guard of the barrow, but there shall be to us a fight at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5554"></td>
        <td id="LC5554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    wall, as fate decrees, each one's Creator._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L5628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5628"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5629"></td>
        <td id="LC5629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The day is now come when the ruler of earthmen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5630"></td>
        <td id="LC5630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Needeth the vigor of valiant heroes:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5631"></td>
        <td id="LC5631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Let us wend us towards him, the war-prince to succor,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5632"></td>
        <td id="LC5632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 While the heat yet rageth, horrible fire-fight.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5633"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5634"></td>
        <td id="LC5634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{I would rather die than go home with out my suzerain.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5635"></td>
        <td id="LC5635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5636"></td>
        <td id="LC5636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          God wot in me, 'tis mickle the liefer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5637"></td>
        <td id="LC5637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The blaze should embrace my body and eat it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5638"></td>
        <td id="LC5638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With my treasure-bestower. Meseemeth not proper</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5639"></td>
        <td id="LC5639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To bear our battle-shields back to our country,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5640"></td>
        <td id="LC5640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 'Less first we are able to fell and destroy the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5641"></td>
        <td id="LC5641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Long-hating foeman, to defend the life of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5642"></td>
        <td id="LC5642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5643"></td>
        <td id="LC5643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Surely he does not deserve to die alone.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5644"></td>
        <td id="LC5644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5645"></td>
        <td id="LC5645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The prince of the Weders. Well do I know 'tisn't</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5646"></td>
        <td id="LC5646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Earned by his exploits, he only of Geatmen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5647"></td>
        <td id="LC5647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Sorrow should suffer, sink in the battle:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5648"></td>
        <td id="LC5648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 Brand and helmet to us both shall be common,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5649"></td>
        <td id="LC5649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          [1]Shield-cover, burnie." Through the bale-smoke he stalked then,</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5744"></td>
        <td id="LC5744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His era of conquest by his own great achievements,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5753"></td>

        <td id="L5754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5754"></td>

        <td id="L5807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5807"></td>

        <td id="L5808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5808"></td>

        <td id="L5814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5814"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5815"></td>
        <td id="LC5815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    [3] For 'gefyldan' (2707), S. proposes 'gefylde.' The passage would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5816"></td>
        <td id="LC5816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    read: _He felled the foe (life drove out strength), and they then both</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5817"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5818"></td>
        <td id="LC5818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    of having felled the dragon; then they combine to annihilate him.--For</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5819"></td>
        <td id="LC5819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    'ellen' (2707), Kl. suggests 'e(a)llne.'--The reading '_life drove out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5820"></td>
        <td id="LC5820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    strength_' is very unsatisfactory and very peculiar. I would suggest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5821"></td>
        <td id="LC5821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    as follows: Adopt S.'s emendation, remove H.'s parenthesis, read</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5822"></td>

        <td id="LC5823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    life-strength_ (that is, made him _hors de combat_), _and then they</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5837"></td>
        <td id="LC5837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          These words being uttered, heeded his liegelord</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5838"></td>

        <td id="L5924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5924"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5925"></td>
        <td id="LC5925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    [1] The word 'oferhÃ­gian' (2767) being vague and little understood,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5926"></td>
        <td id="LC5926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    two quite distinct translations of this passage have arisen. One takes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5927"></td>
        <td id="LC5927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    'oferhÃ­gian' as meaning 'to exceed,' and, inserting 'hord' after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5928"></td>
        <td id="LC5928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    'gehwone,' renders: _The treasure may easily, the gold in the ground,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5929"></td>
        <td id="LC5929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    exceed in value every hoard of man, hide it who will._ The other takes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5930"></td>
        <td id="LC5930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    'oferhÃ­gian' as meaning 'to render arrogant,' and, giving the sentence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5931"></td>
        <td id="LC5931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    a moralizing tone, renders substantially as in the body of this work.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5932"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6123"></td>
        <td id="LC6123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          When for pride overweening the War-Scylfings first did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6124"></td>
        <td id="LC6124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Seek the Geatmen with savage intentions.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6125"></td>
        <td id="LC6125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 Early did Ohthere's age-laden father,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6126"></td>
        <td id="LC6126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Old and terrible, give blow in requital,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6127"></td>
        <td id="LC6127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Killing the sea-king, the queen-mother rescued,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6128"></td>
        <td id="LC6128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The old one his consort deprived of her gold,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6129"></td>
        <td id="LC6129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Onela's mother and Ohthere's also,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6130"></td>
        <td id="LC6130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[99]   40 And then followed the feud-nursing foemen till hardly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6131"></td>
        <td id="LC6131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Reaved of their ruler, they Ravenswood entered.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6132"></td>
        <td id="LC6132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then with vast-numbered forces he assaulted the remnant,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6133"></td>
        <td id="LC6133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Weary with wounds, woe often promised</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6134"></td>
        <td id="LC6134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The livelong night to the sad-hearted war-troop:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6135"></td>
        <td id="LC6135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 Said he at morning would kill them with edges of weapons,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6136"></td>
        <td id="LC6136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Some on the gallows for glee to the fowls.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6137"></td>
        <td id="LC6137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Aid came after to the anxious-in-spirit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6138"></td>
        <td id="LC6138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          At dawn of the day, after Higelac's bugle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6139"></td>
        <td id="LC6139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And trumpet-sound heard they, when the good one proceeded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6140"></td>
        <td id="LC6140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 And faring followed the flower of the troopers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6141"></td>
        <td id="LC6141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC6156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The messenger continues, and refers to the feuds of Swedes and Geats.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6157"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L6158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6158"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6159"></td>
        <td id="LC6159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The death-rush of warmen, widely was noticed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6160"></td>
        <td id="LC6160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          How the folks with each other feud did awaken.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6161"></td>
        <td id="LC6161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The worthy one went then[1] with well-beloved comrades,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6162"></td>
        <td id="LC6162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 Old and dejected to go to the fastness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6163"></td>
        <td id="LC6163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Ongentheo earl upward then turned him;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6164"></td>
        <td id="LC6164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of Higelac's battle he'd heard on inquiry,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6165"></td>
        <td id="LC6165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The exultant one's prowess, despaired of resistance,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6166"></td>
        <td id="LC6166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With earls of the ocean to be able to struggle,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6167"></td>
        <td id="LC6167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       10 'Gainst sea-going sailors to save the hoard-treasure,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6168"></td>
        <td id="LC6168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His wife and his children; he fled after thenceward</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6169"></td>
        <td id="LC6169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Old 'neath the earth-wall. Then was offered pursuance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6170"></td>
        <td id="LC6170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To the braves of the Swedemen, the banner[2] to Higelac.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6171"></td>
        <td id="LC6171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[100]     They fared then forth o'er the field-of-protection,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6172"></td>
        <td id="LC6172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 When the Hrethling heroes hedgeward had thronged them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6173"></td>
        <td id="LC6173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then with edges of irons was Ongentheow driven,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6174"></td>
        <td id="LC6174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The gray-haired to tarry, that the troop-ruler had to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6175"></td>
        <td id="LC6175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Suffer the power solely of Eofor:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6176"></td>
        <td id="LC6176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6177"></td>
        <td id="LC6177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Wulf wounds Ongentheow.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6178"></td>
        <td id="LC6178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6179"></td>
        <td id="LC6179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Wulf then wildly with weapon assaulted him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6180"></td>
        <td id="LC6180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 Wonred his son, that for swinge of the edges</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6181"></td>
        <td id="LC6181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The blood from his body burst out in currents,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6182"></td>
        <td id="LC6182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Forth 'neath his hair. He feared not however,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6183"></td>
        <td id="LC6183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gray-headed Scylfing, but speedily quited</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6184"></td>
        <td id="LC6184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6185"></td>
        <td id="LC6185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Ongentheow gives a stout blow in return.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6186"></td>
        <td id="LC6186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6187"></td>
        <td id="LC6187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The wasting wound-stroke with worse exchange,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6188"></td>
        <td id="LC6188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 When the king of the thane-troop thither did turn him:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6189"></td>
        <td id="LC6189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The wise-mooded son of Wonred was powerless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6190"></td>
        <td id="LC6190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To give a return-blow to the age-hoary man,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6191"></td>
        <td id="LC6191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But his head-shielding helmet first hewed he to pieces,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6192"></td>
        <td id="LC6192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That flecked with gore perforce he did totter,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6193"></td>
        <td id="LC6193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 Fell to the earth; not fey was he yet then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6194"></td>
        <td id="LC6194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But up did he spring though an edge-wound had reached him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6195"></td>
        <td id="LC6195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6196"></td>
        <td id="LC6196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Eofor smites Ongentheow fiercely.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6197"></td>
        <td id="LC6197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6198"></td>
        <td id="LC6198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Then Higelac's vassal, valiant and dauntless,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6199"></td>
        <td id="LC6199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          When his brother lay dead, made his broad-bladed weapon,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6200"></td>
        <td id="LC6200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Giant-sword ancient, defence of the giants,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6201"></td>
        <td id="LC6201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 Bound o'er the shield-wall; the folk-prince succumbed then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6202"></td>
        <td id="LC6202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6203"></td>
        <td id="LC6203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Ongentheow is slain.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6204"></td>
        <td id="LC6204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6205"></td>
        <td id="LC6205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Shepherd of people, was pierced to the vitals.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6206"></td>
        <td id="LC6206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          There were many attendants who bound up his kinsman,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6207"></td>
        <td id="LC6207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Carried him quickly when occasion was granted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6208"></td>
        <td id="LC6208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That the place of the slain they were suffered to manage.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6209"></td>
        <td id="LC6209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 This pending, one hero plundered the other,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6210"></td>
        <td id="LC6210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His armor of iron from Ongentheow ravished,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6211"></td>
        <td id="LC6211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His hard-sword hilted and helmet together;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6212"></td>
        <td id="LC6212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6213"></td>
        <td id="LC6213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Eofor takes the old king's war-gear to Higelac.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6214"></td>
        <td id="LC6214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6215"></td>
        <td id="LC6215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The old one's equipments he carried to Higelac.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6216"></td>
        <td id="LC6216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He the jewels received, and rewards 'mid the troopers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6217"></td>
        <td id="LC6217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 Graciously promised, and so did accomplish:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6218"></td>
        <td id="LC6218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The king of the Weders requited the war-rush,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6219"></td>
        <td id="LC6219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hrethel's descendant, when home he repaired him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6220"></td>
        <td id="LC6220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6221"></td>
        <td id="LC6221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Higelac rewards the brothers.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6222"></td>
        <td id="LC6222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6223"></td>
        <td id="LC6223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To Eofor and Wulf with wide-lavished treasures,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6224"></td>
        <td id="LC6224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To each of them granted a hundred of thousands</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6225"></td>
        <td id="LC6225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[101]  50 In land and rings wrought out of wire:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6226"></td>
        <td id="LC6226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6227"></td>
        <td id="LC6227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{His gifts were beyond cavil.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6228"></td>
        <td id="LC6228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6229"></td>
        <td id="LC6229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          None upon mid-earth needed to twit him[3]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6230"></td>
        <td id="LC6230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          With the gifts he gave them, when glory they conquered;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6231"></td>
        <td id="LC6231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6232"></td>
        <td id="LC6232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{To Eofor he also gives his only daughter in marriage.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6233"></td>
        <td id="LC6233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6234"></td>
        <td id="LC6234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And to Eofor then gave he his one only daughter,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6235"></td>
        <td id="LC6235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The honor of home, as an earnest of favor.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6236"></td>
        <td id="LC6236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 That's the feud and hatred--as ween I 'twill happen--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6237"></td>
        <td id="LC6237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The anger of earthmen, that earls of the Swedemen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6238"></td>
        <td id="LC6238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Will visit on us, when they hear that our leader</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6239"></td>
        <td id="LC6239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Lifeless is lying, he who longtime protected</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6240"></td>
        <td id="LC6240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          His hoard and kingdom 'gainst hating assailers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6241"></td>
        <td id="LC6241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       60 Who on the fall of the heroes defended of yore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6242"></td>
        <td id="LC6242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The deed-mighty Scyldings,[4] did for the troopers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6243"></td>
        <td id="LC6243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          What best did avail them, and further moreover</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6244"></td>
        <td id="LC6244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6245"></td>
        <td id="LC6245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{It is time for us to pay the last marks of respect to our lord.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6246"></td>
        <td id="LC6246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6247"></td>
        <td id="LC6247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hero-deeds 'complished. Now is haste most fitting,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6248"></td>
        <td id="LC6248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That the lord of liegemen we look upon yonder,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6249"></td>
        <td id="LC6249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       65 And _that_ one carry on journey to death-pyre</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6250"></td>
        <td id="LC6250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who ring-presents gave us. Not aught of it all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6251"></td>
        <td id="LC6251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Shall melt with the brave one--there's a mass of bright jewels,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6252"></td>
        <td id="LC6252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gold beyond measure, grewsomely purchased</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6253"></td>
        <td id="LC6253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And ending it all ornament-rings too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6254"></td>
        <td id="LC6254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       70 Bought with his life; these fire shall devour,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6255"></td>
        <td id="LC6255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Flame shall cover, no earlman shall wear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6256"></td>
        <td id="LC6256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A jewel-memento, nor beautiful virgin</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6257"></td>
        <td id="LC6257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Have on her neck rings to adorn her,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6258"></td>
        <td id="LC6258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          But wretched in spirit bereavÃ¨d of gold-gems</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6259"></td>
        <td id="LC6259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       75 She shall oft with others be exiled and banished,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6260"></td>
        <td id="LC6260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Since the leader of liegemen hath laughter forsaken,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6261"></td>
        <td id="LC6261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[102]     Mirth and merriment. Hence many a war-spear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6262"></td>
        <td id="LC6262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Cold from the morning shall be clutched in the fingers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6263"></td>
        <td id="LC6263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Heaved in the hand, no harp-music's sound shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6264"></td>
        <td id="LC6264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       80 Waken the warriors, but the wan-coated raven</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6265"></td>
        <td id="LC6265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fain over fey ones freely shall gabble,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6266"></td>
        <td id="LC6266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Shall say to the eagle how he sped in the eating,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6267"></td>
        <td id="LC6267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          When, the wolf his companion, he plundered the slain."</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6268"></td>
        <td id="LC6268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          So the high-minded hero was rehearsing these stories</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6270"></td>
        <td id="LC6270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6277"></td>
        <td id="LC6277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       90 His slaughter-bed holding, him who rings had given them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6278"></td>
        <td id="LC6278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          In days that were done; then the death-bringing moment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6279"></td>
        <td id="LC6279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Was come to the good one, that the king very warlike,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6280"></td>
        <td id="LC6280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Wielder of Weders, with wonder-death perished.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6281"></td>
        <td id="LC6281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          First they beheld there a creature more wondrous,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6282"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6283"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6284"></td>
        <td id="LC6284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6285"></td>
        <td id="LC6285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       95 The worm on the field, in front of them lying,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6286"></td>
        <td id="LC6286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The foeman before them: the fire-spewing dragon,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6287"></td>
        <td id="LC6287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Ghostly and grisly guest in his terrors,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6288"></td>
        <td id="LC6288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Was scorched in the fire; as he lay there he measured</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6289"></td>
        <td id="LC6289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fifty of feet; came forth in the night-time[5]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6290"></td>
        <td id="LC6290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">      100 To rejoice in the air, thereafter departing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6291"></td>
        <td id="LC6291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          To visit his den; he in death was then fastened,</td>
