      <tr>
        <td id="L6292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6292"></td>
        <td id="LC6292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          He would joy in no other earth-hollowed caverns.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6293"></td>
        <td id="LC6293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          There stood round about him beakers and vessels,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6294"></td>
        <td id="LC6294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Dishes were lying and dear-valued weapons,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6295"></td>
        <td id="LC6295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">      105 With iron-rust eaten, as in earth's mighty bosom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6296"></td>
        <td id="LC6296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A thousand of winters there they had rested:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6297"></td>
        <td id="LC6297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6298"></td>
        <td id="LC6298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The hoard was under a magic spell.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6299"></td>
        <td id="LC6299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6300"></td>
        <td id="LC6300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That mighty bequest then with magic was guarded,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6301"></td>
        <td id="LC6301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gold of the ancients, that earlman not any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6302"></td>
        <td id="LC6302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The ring-hall could touch, save Ruling-God only,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6303"></td>
        <td id="LC6303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[103] 110 Sooth-king of Vict'ries gave whom He wished to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6304"></td>
        <td id="LC6304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6305"></td>
        <td id="LC6305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{God alone could give access to it.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6306"></td>
        <td id="LC6306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6307"></td>
        <td id="LC6307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          [6](He is earth-folk's protector) to open the treasure,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6308"></td>
        <td id="LC6308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          E'en to such among mortals as seemed to Him proper.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6309"></td>
        <td id="LC6309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6310"></td>
        <td id="LC6310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    [1] For 'gÃ³da,' which seems a surprising epithet for a Geat to apply</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6311"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6404"></td>
        <td id="LC6404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          While he reveled in riches. Let us rouse us and hasten</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6405"></td>
        <td id="LC6405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[105]     Again to see and seek for the treasure,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6406"></td>
        <td id="LC6406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 The wonder 'neath wall. The way I will show you,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6407"></td>
        <td id="LC6407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          That close ye may look at ring-gems sufficient</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6408"></td>
        <td id="LC6408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And gold in abundance. Let the bier with promptness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6409"></td>
        <td id="LC6409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fully be fashioned, when forth we shall come,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6410"></td>
        <td id="LC6410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And lift we our lord, then, where long he shall tarry,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6411"></td>
        <td id="LC6411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       50 Well-beloved warrior, 'neath the Wielder's protection."</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6412"></td>
        <td id="LC6412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6413"></td>
        <td id="LC6413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Wiglaf charges them to build a funeral-pyre.}</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6414"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6417"></td>
        <td id="LC6417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Holders of homesteads, that they hither from far,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6418"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6419"></td>
        <td id="LC6419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       55 With wood for his pyre: "The flame shall now swallow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6420"></td>
        <td id="LC6420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          (The wan fire shall wax[7]) the warriors' leader</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6421"></td>
        <td id="LC6421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Who the rain of the iron often abided,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6422"></td>

        <td id="L6424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6424"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6497"></td>
        <td id="LC6497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Behung with helmets, hero-knights' targets,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6498"></td>
        <td id="LC6498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And bright-shining burnies, as he begged they should have them;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6499"></td>
        <td id="LC6499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        5 Then wailing war-heroes their world-famous chieftain,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6500"></td>
        <td id="LC6500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Their liegelord beloved, laid in the middle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6501"></td>
        <td id="LC6501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6502"></td>
        <td id="LC6502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The funeral-flame.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6503"></td>
        <td id="LC6503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6504"></td>
        <td id="LC6504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Soldiers began then to make on the barrow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6505"></td>
        <td id="LC6505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The largest of dead-fires: dark o'er the vapor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6506"></td>
        <td id="LC6506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The smoke-cloud ascended, the sad-roaring fire,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6507"></td>
        <td id="LC6507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       10 Mingled with weeping (the wind-roar subsided)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6508"></td>
        <td id="LC6508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Till the building of bone it had broken to pieces,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6509"></td>
        <td id="LC6509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Hot in the heart. Heavy in spirit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6510"></td>
        <td id="LC6510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          They mood-sad lamented the men-leader's ruin;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6511"></td>
        <td id="LC6511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And mournful measures the much-grieving widow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6512"></td>
        <td id="LC6512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       15 *       *       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6513"></td>
        <td id="LC6513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          *       *       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6514"></td>
        <td id="LC6514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          *       *       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6515"></td>
        <td id="LC6515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          *       *       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6516"></td>
        <td id="LC6516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          *       *       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6517"></td>
        <td id="LC6517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       20 *       *       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6518"></td>
        <td id="LC6518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6519"></td>
        <td id="LC6519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{The Weders carry out their lord's last request.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6520"></td>
        <td id="LC6520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6521"></td>
        <td id="LC6521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The men of the Weders made accordingly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6522"></td>
        <td id="LC6522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          A hill on the height, high and extensive,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6523"></td>
        <td id="LC6523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Of sea-going sailors to be seen from a distance,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6524"></td>
        <td id="LC6524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          And the brave one's beacon built where the fire was,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6525"></td>
        <td id="LC6525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       25 In ten-days' space, with a wall surrounded it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6526"></td>
        <td id="LC6526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          As wisest of world-folk could most worthily plan it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6527"></td>
        <td id="LC6527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          They placed in the barrow rings and jewels,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6528"></td>
        <td id="LC6528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6529"></td>
        <td id="LC6529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[107]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6530"></td>
        <td id="LC6530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6531"></td>
        <td id="LC6531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{Rings and gems are laid in the barrow.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6532"></td>
        <td id="LC6532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6533"></td>
        <td id="LC6533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          All such ornaments as erst in the treasure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6534"></td>
        <td id="LC6534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          War-mooded men had won in possession:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6535"></td>
        <td id="LC6535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       30 The earnings of earlmen to earth they entrusted,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6536"></td>
        <td id="LC6536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          The gold to the dust, where yet it remaineth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6537"></td>
        <td id="LC6537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          As useless to mortals as in foregoing eras.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6538"></td>
        <td id="LC6538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          'Round the dead-mound rode then the doughty-in-battle,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6539"></td>
        <td id="LC6539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Bairns of all twelve of the chiefs of the people,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6540"></td>
        <td id="LC6540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6541"></td>
        <td id="LC6541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{They mourn for their lord, and sing his praises.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6542"></td>
        <td id="LC6542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6543"></td>
        <td id="LC6543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       35 More would they mourn, lament for their ruler,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6544"></td>
        <td id="LC6544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Speak in measure, mention him with pleasure,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6545"></td>
        <td id="LC6545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Weighed his worth, and his warlike achievements</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6546"></td>
        <td id="LC6546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Mightily commended, as 'tis meet one praise his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6547"></td>
        <td id="LC6547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Liegelord in words and love him in spirit,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6548"></td>
        <td id="LC6548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       40 When forth from his body he fares to destruction.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6549"></td>
        <td id="LC6549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          So lamented mourning the men of the Geats,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6550"></td>
        <td id="LC6550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Fond-loving vassals, the fall of their lord,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6551"></td>
        <td id="LC6551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6552"></td>
        <td id="LC6552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">{An ideal king.}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6553"></td>
        <td id="LC6553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6554"></td>
        <td id="LC6554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Said he was kindest of kings under heaven,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6555"></td>
        <td id="LC6555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">          Gentlest of men, most winning of manner,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6556"></td>
        <td id="LC6556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       45 Friendliest to folk-troops and fondest of honor.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6557"></td>
        <td id="LC6557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6558"></td>
        <td id="LC6558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[109]</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC6566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Several discrepancies and other oversights have been noticed in the H.-So.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6567"></td>
        <td id="LC6567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glossary. Of these a good part were avoided by Harrison and Sharp, the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6568"></td>
        <td id="LC6568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">American editors of Beowulf, in their last edition, 1888. The rest will, I</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6569"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6570"></td>
        <td id="LC6570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the hands of some who have no copy of the American edition, it seems</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6571"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6867"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6868"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6869"></td>
        <td id="LC6869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your written explanation.  The person or entity that provided you with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6870"></td>
        <td id="LC6870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the defective work may elect to provide a replacement copy in lieu of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6871"></td>
        <td id="LC6871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">refund.  If you received the work electronically, the person or entity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6872"></td>
        <td id="LC6872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">providing it to you may choose to give you a second opportunity to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6873"></td>
        <td id="LC6873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">receive the work electronically in lieu of a refund.  If the second copy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6874"></td>
        <td id="LC6874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is also defective, you may demand a refund in writing without further</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6875"></td>
        <td id="LC6875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opportunities to fix the problem.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC6956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">status with the IRS.</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6958"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6959"></td>
        <td id="LC6959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">charities and charitable donations in all 50 states of the United</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6960"></td>
        <td id="LC6960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">States.  Compliance requirements are not uniform and it takes a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC6961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considerable effort, much paperwork and many fees to meet and keep up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6962"></td>
        <td id="LC6962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with these requirements.  We do not solicit donations in locations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6963"></td>
        <td id="LC6963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where we have not received written confirmation of compliance.  To</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6964"></td>
